vidyāvibhaktadeho 'tha sarvābhir yugapat saha  araṃstāsurakanyābhis tābhiḥ saha nṛpātmajaḥ 
tāttvikena tu dehena bhajate sma sa bhūyasā  mahallikāṃ priyatamāṃ prahlādāsurakanyakām 
ekadā ca niśi svairaṃ sthitas tāṃ sa mahallikām  evaṃ sūryaprabho 'pṛcchad abhijātāṃ kathāntare 
priye rātrau sahāyāte ye dve sakhyau tadā tava  te kutastye na paśyāmi kiṃ ca te kva gate iti 
tato mahallikāvādīt suṣṭhv ahaṃ smāritā tvayā  te na dve eva tāḥ santi vayasyā dvādaśeha me 
matpitṛvyeṇa ca svargād ānītā apahṛtya tāḥ  ekāmṛtaprabhā nāma dvitīyā keśinī tathā 
parvatasya muner ete tanaye śubhalakṣaṇe  kālindīti tṛtīyā ca caturthī bhadriketi ca 
tathā darpakamāleti pañcamī cārulocanā  etā mahāmunes tisro devalasyātmasaṃbhavāḥ 
ṣaṣṭhī saudāmanī nāma saptamī cojjvalābhidhā  ete hāhābhidhānasya gandharvasya sute ubhe 
aṣṭamī pīvarā nāma gandharvasya huhoḥ sutā  navamy añjanikā nāma kālasya duhitā vibhoḥ 
piṅgalāc ca gaṇāj jātā daśamī kesarāvalī  ekādaśī mālinīti nāmnā kambalanandinī 
nāmnā mandāramāleti dvādaśī vasukanyakā  apsaraḥsu samutpannāḥ sarvā divyastriyas tu tāḥ 
pātālaṃ prathamaṃ nītās tāś codvāhe kṛte mama  tubhyaṃ mayā ca deyās tās tadyuktā syāṃ sadā yathā 
pratijñātaṃ mayā caitat tāsāṃ sneho hi tāsu me  tāto 'py ukto mayā tena na dattā bhrātrapekṣiṇā 
etac chrutvā savailakṣyas tāṃ sa sūryaprabho 'bravīt  priye mahānubhāvā tvam ahaṃ kuryāṃ kathaṃ tv idam 
vailakṣyas em for vailakṣas
evaṃ sūryaprabheṇoktā ruṣāvocan mahallikā  matsamakṣaṃ vahasy anyā madvayasyās tu necchasi 
yābhir viyuktā rajyeyaṃ nāham ekam api kṣaṇam  ity uktas tu tayā sūryaprabhas tuṣṭyānvamaṃsta tat 
tatas tad eva pātālaṃ nītvaiva prathamaṃ tayā  prahlādasutayā tasmai pradattā dvādaśāpi tāḥ 
athāmṛtaprabhāmukhyās tāḥ sa sūryaprabhaḥ kramāt  pariṇīyopabhuṅkte sma tasyāṃ divyāṅganā niśi 
prātaś ca tāḥ prabhāsena nāyayitvā rasātalam  caturthaṃ sthāpayām āsa cchannāḥ pṛṣṭvā mahallikām 
svayaṃ cālakṣitaḥ sākaṃ tayā tatraiva so 'gamat  sabhājanāya ca prāgvat prahlādasya sabhāṃ yayau 
tatrāsurendro vakti sma taṃ sunīthaṃ mayaṃ ca saḥ  yāta sarve ditidanū draṣṭuṃ devyāv ubhe iti 
tathety atha rasātalāt sapadi nirgatās te tato yathāsvam asuraiḥ samaṃ mayasunīthasūryaprabhāḥ  vimānam anucintitaṃ tad adhiruhya bhūtāsanaṃ sumerugirisānugaṃ prayayur āśramaṃ kāśyapam 
tatra te ditidanū sahasthite sādarair munijanair niveditāḥ  abhyupetya dadṛśuḥ krameṇa te pādayoś ca śirasā vavandire 
te ca tān asuramātarāv ubhe sānugān samavalokya sādare  sāśru mūrdhni paricumbya saṃmadād āśiṣo 'nupadam ūcatur mayam 
prāptajīvitam amuṃ tavātmajaṃ vīkṣya putraka sunītham āvayoḥ  cakṣur adya saphalatvam āgataṃ tvāṃ ca puṇyakṛtam eva manmahe 
sumuṇḍīkaṃ caitaṃ kṛtinam iha sūryaprabhatayā punarjātaṃ divyākṛtidharam asādhāraṇaguṇam  citaṃ bhāviśreyaḥprathamapiśunair lakṣaṇagaṇair vilokyāntastoṣāt sphuṭam iha namāvaḥ svavapuṣi 
tac chīghram uttiṣṭhata yāta vatsāḥ prajāpatiṃ draṣṭum ihāryaputram  taddarśanād vo bhavitārthasiddhiḥ kāryaṃ ca vas tadvacanaṃ śivāya 
iti tābhyām ādiṣṭā devībhyāṃ te tathaiva gatvā tam  kaśyapamuniṃ mayādyā dadṛśur divyāśrame tatra 
drutaśuddhahāṭakābhaṃ tejomayam āśrame ca devānām  jvālākapilajaṭādharam analasamānaṃ durādharṣam 
upagamya ca tasya pādayos te nipatanti sma sahānugaiḥ krameṇa  atha so 'pi muhuḥ kṛtocitāśīḥ paritoṣād upaveśya tān uvāca 
ānandaḥ paramo mamaiṣa yad amī dṛṣṭāḥ stha sarve sutāḥ ślāghyas tvaṃ maya satpathād acalito yaḥ sarvavidyāspadam  dhanyas tvaṃ ca sunītha yena gatam apy āptaṃ punar jīvitaṃ tvaṃ sūryaprabha puṇyavāṃś ca bhavitā yaḥ khecarāṇāṃ patiḥ 
tad dharme pathi vartitavyam adhunā boddhavyam asmadvaco bhokṣyadhve satataṃ sukhāni paramām āsādya yena śriyam  naiva syāc ca purā yathā paribhavo bhūyaḥ parebhyo 'tra vo dharmātikramiṇo 'surā hi murajiccakrasya yātā vaśam 
ye cāsurā devahatāḥ sunītha martyapravīrās ta ime 'vatīrṇāḥ  yo 'bhūt sumuṇḍīka ihānujas te sūryaprabhaḥ saiṣa kilādya jātaḥ 
anye 'pi te 'mī asurā vayasyā asyaiva jātāḥ khalu bāndhavāś ca  yaḥ śambarākhyaś ca mahāsuro 'bhūt saiṣo 'dya jātaḥ sacivaḥ prahastaḥ 
yaś cāsuro 'bhūt triśirā sa jātaḥ siddhārthanāmā sacivo mayasya  vātāpir ity āsa ca dānavo yaḥ prajñāḍhyanāmāsya sa eva mantrī 
ulūkanāmā danujaś ca yo 'bhūt so 'yaṃ vayasyo 'sya śubhaṃkarākhyaḥ  yo 'yaṃ vayasyo 'sya ca vītabhītiḥ sa kālanāmāpy abhavat surāriḥ 
yaś caiṣa bhāṣaḥ sacivo 'sya so 'yaṃ daityo 'vatīrṇo vṛṣaparvanāmā  yo 'yaṃ prabhāsaś ca sa eṣa daityo vatsāvatīrṇaḥ prabalābhidhānaḥ 
mahātmanā ratnamayena yena devair vipakṣair api yācitena  kṛtvā śarīraṃ dalaśo 'vatīrṇaṃ ratnāni jātāny akhilāni yasmāt 
tattoṣataś caṇḍikayāsya devyā varo 'nyadehānugataḥ sa dattaḥ  yena prabhāso 'dya sa eṣa jāto mahābalo duṣprasaho ripūṇām 
yau dānavāv abhūtāṃ pūrvaṃ sundopasundanāmānau  tāv etau sarvadamanabhayaṃkarāv asya mantriṇau jātau 
yaś ca hayagrīvākhyo vikaṭākṣaś cāsurāv abhūtāṃ dvau  sthirabuddhimahābuddhī utpannāv asya tāv imau sacivau 
anye 'py asya ya ete śvaśurāḥ sacivādibāndhavā ye ca  te 'py avatīrṇā asurā yair indrādyāḥ purā jitā bahuśaḥ 
tad yuṣmākaṃ pakṣaḥ punar apy evaṃ kramād gato vṛddhim  dhīrā bhavata samṛddhiṃ prāpsyatha dharmād avicyutāḥ paramām 
iti vadati kaśyaparṣau dākṣāyaṇyaḥ kilāsya patnyo 'tra  aditipramukhāḥ sarvā mādhyaṃdinasavanasamaya ājagmuḥ 
dattvāśiṣaṃ mayādiṣu namatsu bhartuḥ kṛtāhnikājñāsu  tāsv atha śakro 'trāgāt salokapālo 'pi taṃ muniṃ draṣṭum 
vanditasadārakaśyapamunicaraṇo vandito mayādyaiś ca  so 'tha saroṣaṃ paśyan sūryaprabham uktavān mayaṃ śakraḥ 
eṣo 'rbhakaḥ sa jāne vidyādharacakravartitākāmaḥ  tad asau svalpena kathaṃ saṃtuṣṭo nendratāṃ kim arthayate 
tac chrutvaiva mayas taṃ jagāda deveśa tat tvayindratvam  parameśvareṇa nirmitam ādiṣṭaṃ cāsya khecareśatvam 
iti mayavacanān maghavā sa tadā vihasann uvāca sāmarṣaḥ  atyalpaṃ hi tad asyāḥ sulakṣaṇasyākṛter amuṣyeti 
atha sa mayo 'py avadat taṃ śrutaśarmā yatra khecarendratve  yogyas tatrāsaṃśayam ākṛtir asyeyam arhatindratvam 
eyam em for of āyam
ity uktavate tasmai mayāya kupitaḥ sa vajram udyamya  maghavottasthau kaśyapamunir akaroc cātha kopahuṃkāram 
dhikkāramukharatāmrair vadanaiḥ kopaṃ yayuś ca dityādyāḥ  tata indraḥ śāpabhayād upāviśat saṃhṛtāyudho 'vanataḥ 
praṇipatya pādayor atha dārayutaṃ taṃ surāsuraprabhavam  kaśyapamuniṃ prasādya ca vijñāpitavān kṛtāñjaliḥ śakraḥ 
śrutaśarmaṇe mayā yad bhagavan vidyādharādhirājatvam  dattaṃ tad eṣa hartuṃ sūryaprabha udyato 'dhunā tasya 
eṣa ca sarvākāraṃ mayo 'sya tatsādhane kṛtodyogaḥ  tac chrutvā sa tam indraṃ ditidanusahitaḥ prajāpatir avocat 
iṣṭas te śrutaśarmā maghavan sūryaprabhaś ca śarvasya  na ca tasyecchāmi tathā tenājñaptaś ca pūrvam atra mayaḥ 
tat tvaṃ mayasya kiṃ khalu jalpasi kathayātra ko 'parādho 'sya  eṣa hi dharmapathastho jñānī vijñānavān gurupraṇataḥ 
bhasmākariṣyad asmatkrodhāgnis tvām aghaṃ vyadhāsyaś cet  na ca śaktas tvam imaṃ prati prabhāvam etasya kiṃ na jānāsi 
iti muninātra sadāreṇokte lajjābhayānate cendre  aditir uvāca sa kīdṛk śrutaśarmā darśyatām ihānīya 
etan niśamya śakro mātalim ādiśya tatkṣaṇaṃ tatra  ānāyayati sma sa taṃ śrutaśarmāṇaṃ nabhaścarādhīśam 
taṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛtavinatiṃ vīkṣya ca sūryaprabhaṃ tam aprākṣuḥ  kaśyapamuniṃ svabhāryāḥ ka etayo rūpalakṣaṇāḍhya iti 
atha sa munīndro 'vādīc chrutaśarmāsyāpi na prabhāsasya  etat sacivasya samaḥ kiṃ punar etasya nirupamānasya 
sūryaprabha eṣa yato divyais tai rūpalakṣaṇair yuktaḥ  yair asyādhyavasāyaṃ vidadhānasyindratāpi nāsulabhā 
iti kaśyaparṣivacanaṃ sarve 'pi śraddadhus tathety atra  tata eṣa mayāya varaṃ dadau muniḥ śṛṇvato mahendrasya 
yat putra nirvikāraṃ bhavatā sthitam udyatāyudhe 'pindre  tenājarāmaro 'ṅgair vajramayair akṣataś ca bhavitāsi 
etāv api te sadṛśau sunīthasūryaprabhau mahāsattvau  śaśvad aparibhavanīyau bhaviṣyataḥ sakalavairivargasya 
eṣa suvāsakumāraś cāpadrajanīṣu cintitopagataḥ  sāhāyakaṃ kariṣyati mattanayaḥ śaradijendusamakāntiḥ 
ity uktavato 'sya muner bhāryā ṛṣayaś ca lokapālāś ca  sadasi mayaprabhṛtibhyas tebhyaḥ sarve varān dadus tadvat 
aditir atha śakram avadad viramāvinayāt prasādayendra mayam  dṛṣṭaṃ vinayaphalaṃ hi tvayādya yad anena sadvarāḥ prāptāḥ 
tac chrutvā mayam indraḥ pāṇāv ālambya toṣayām āsa  sūryaprabhābhibhūtaḥ śrutaśarmā cābhavad dinendunibhaḥ 
praṇamya tam atha kṣaṇāt surapatir guruṃ kaśyapaṃ jagāma sa yathāgataṃ nikhilalokapālānvitaḥ  mayaprabhṛtayo 'pi te munivarasya tasyājñayā tataḥ khalu tadāśramāt prakṛtakāryasiddhyai yayuḥ 
iti mahākaviśrīsomadevabhaṭṭaviracite kathāsaritsāgare sūryaprabhalambake dvitīyastaraṅgaḥ  tṛtīyas taraṅgaḥ  tato mayasunīthau tau gatvā sūryaprabhaś ca saḥ  kaśyapasyāśramāt tasmāt saṃprāpuḥ sarva eva te 
saṃgamaṃ candrabhāgāyā airāvatyāś ca yatra te  sthitāḥ sūryaprabhasyārthe rājāno mittrabāndhavāḥ 
prāptaṃ sūryaprabhaṃ te ca dṛṣṭvā tatra sthitā nṛpāḥ  rudanto 'gre samuttasthur viṣaṇṇā maraṇonmukhāḥ 
candraprabhādarśanajāṃ teṣām āśaṅkya duḥkhitām  sūryaprabho 'khilaṃ tebhyo yathāvṛttaṃ śaśaṃsa tat 
tathāpi vignāḥ pṛṣṭās te tena kṛcchrād avarṇayan  tasya bhāryāpaharaṇaṃ vihitaṃ śrutaśarmaṇā 
tatparābhavaduḥkhāc ca dehatyāgodyamaṃ nijam  vāritaṃ divyayā vācā tathaivāsmai nyavedayat 
tataḥ sūryaprabhas tatra pratijñām akarot krudhā  yadi brahmādayaḥ sarve 'py abhirakṣanti taṃ surāḥ 
tathāpy unmūlanīyo me śrutaśarmā sa niścitam  paradārāpaharaṇe chadmaprāgalbhyavāñ śaṭhaḥ 
evaṃ kṛtapratijñaś ca gantuṃ tadvijayāya saḥ  lagnaṃ niścitavān dṛṣṭaṃ gaṇakaiḥ saptame 'hani 
tatas taṃ niścitaṃ jñātvā gṛhītavijayodyamam  draḍhayitvā punar vācā prāha sūryaprabhaṃ mayaḥ 
satyaṃ kṛtodyamas tvaṃ cet tad vadāmi mayā tadā  māyāṃ pradarśya nītvā te pātāle sthāpitāḥ priyāḥ 
evaṃ tvaṃ vijayodyogaṃ karoṣi rabhasād iti  naivam eva tathā hy agnir jvaled vāterito yathā 
tad ehi yāmaḥ pātālaṃ priyās te darśayāmi tāḥ  evaṃ mayavacaḥ śrutvā nananduḥ sarva eva te 
prāktanena ca tenaiva praviśya vivareṇa te  jagmuś caturthaṃ pātālaṃ mayāsurapuraḥsarāḥ 
tatraikato vāsagṛhān mayaḥ sūryaprabhāya tāḥ  bharyā madanasenādyā ānīyāsau samarpayat 
gṛhītvā tās tathānyāś ca patnīs tāḥ so 'surātmajāḥ  yayau sūryaprabho draṣṭuṃ prahlādaṃ mayavākyataḥ 
mayāc chrutavaraprāptiḥ praṇataṃ taṃ ca so 'suraḥ  āttāyudho 'tha jijñāsuḥ kṛtakakrodham abhyadhāt 
śrutaṃ mayā durācāra yat kanyā dvādaśa tvayā  bhrātrārjitā me 'pahṛtās tat tvāṃ hanmy eṣa paśya mām 
tac chrutvā nirvikāras taṃ paśyan sūryaprabho 'bravīt  maccharīraṃ tvadāyattam avinītaṃ praśādhi mām 
ity uktavantaṃ prahlādo vihasya tam uvāca saḥ  prekṣito 'si mayā yāvad darpaleśo 'pi nāsti te 
varaṃ gṛhāṇa tuṣṭo 'smīty uktas tena tatheti saḥ  bhaktiṃ guruṣu śaṃbhau ca vavre sūryaprabho varam 
tatas tuṣṭeṣu sarveṣu tasmai sūryaprabhāya saḥ  prahlādo yāminīṃ nāma dvitīyāṃ tanayāṃ dadau 
sahāyatve ca putrau dvau tasyādāt so 'sureśvaraḥ  tataḥ sarvaiḥ sahāmīlapārśvaṃ sūryaprabho yayau 
so 'pi śrutavaraprāptituṣṭas tasmai sukhāvatīm  dadau dvitīyāṃ tanayāṃ sāhāyye ca sutadvayam 
tataḥ sabhājayann anyān sāhāyyāyāsurādhipān  sthitaḥ sūryaprabhaḥ so 'tra teṣv ahaḥsu priyāsakhaḥ 
tisraḥ sunīthabhāryāś ca svabhāryāś ca nṛpātmajāḥ  sarvāḥ sagarbhāḥ saṃjātā mayādisahito 'śṛṇot 
pṛṣṭāś ca dohadaṃ tulyaṃ śaśaṃsur akhilā api  mahāhavadidṛkṣāṃ tā nanandātha mayāsuraḥ 
etāsu diṣṭyā saṃbhūtā asurā ye purā hatāḥ  tena jāto 'bhilāṣo 'yam etāsām iti so 'vadat 
evaṃ yayuḥ ṣaḍdivasāḥ saptame te rasātalāt  bhāryādiyuktā nirjagmuḥ sarve sūryaprabhādayaḥ 
utpātamāyā vighnāya yā teṣāṃ darśitāribhiḥ  sā suvāsakumāreṇa smṛtāyātena nāśitā 
tataś cāndraprabhaṃ pṛthvīrājye ratnaprabhaṃ śiśum  abhiṣicya samārūḍhabhūtāsanavimānakāḥ 
sarve vidyādharendrasya sumeros te niketanam  yayur mayagirā pūrvagaṅgātīratapovanam 
tatra tān sauhṛdaprāptān sa sumerur apūjayat  mayoktāśeṣavṛttāntaḥ pūrvājñāṃ śāṃbhavīṃ smaran 
taddeśasthāś ca te svaṃ svaṃ sainyaṃ sūryaprabhādikāḥ  kārtsnyenānāyayām āsur bandhūṃś ca suhṛdas tathā 
āyayuḥ prathamaṃ sūryaprabhasya śvaśurātmajāḥ  rājaputrā mayādiṣṭā vidyāḥ saṃsādhya sodyamāḥ 
teṣāṃ haribhaṭādīnāṃ ṣoḍaśānāṃ rathāyutam  dve cāyute padātīnām ekaikasyānugaṃ balam 
tadanu sthitasaṃketā ājagmur daityadānavāḥ  śvaśuryāḥ śvaśurā mittrāṇy anye caitasya bāndhavāḥ 
hṛṣṭaromā mahāmāyaḥ siṃhadaṃṣṭraḥ prakampanaḥ  tantukaccho durārohaḥ sumāyo vajrapañjaraḥ 
dhūmaketuḥ pramathano vikaṭākṣaś ca dānavaḥ  bahavo 'nye 'pi cājagmur ā saptamarasātalāt 
kaścid rathānām ayutaiḥ saptabhiḥ kaścid aṣṭabhiḥ  kaścit ṣaḍbhis tribhiḥ kaścid yo 'tisvalpo 'yutena saḥ 
padātīnāṃ tribhir lakṣaiḥ kaścil lakṣadvayena ca  kaścit kaścit tu lakṣeṇa lakṣārdhenādhamas tu yaḥ 
ekaikasya ca hastyaśvam āgāt tadanusārataḥ  asaṃkhyam āyayau cānyat sainyaṃ mayasunīthayoḥ 
sūryaprabhasya cāmeyam ājagāma nijaṃ balam  vasudattādibhūpānāṃ sumeroś ca tathaiva ca 
tato mayāsuro 'pṛcchac cintitopasthitaṃ munim  taṃ suvāsakumārākhyaṃ saha sūryaprabhādibhiḥ 
vikṣiptam etad bhagavan sainyaṃ nehopalakṣyate  tad brūhi kutra vistīrṇaṃ yugapad dṛśyatām iti 
ito yojanamātre 'sti kalāpagrāmasaṃjñakaḥ  pradeśas tatra vistīrṇe gatvaitat pravilokyatām 
ity ukte tena muninā tadyuktāḥ sasumerukāḥ  yayuḥ kalāpagrāmaṃ taṃ sarve te svabalaiḥ saha 
tatronnatasthānagatā dadṛśus te pṛthak pṛthak  saṃniveśyāsurāṇāṃ ca nṛpāṇāṃ ca varūthinīḥ 
tataḥ sumerur āha sma śrutaśarmā balādhikaḥ  santi vidyādharādhīśās tasya hy ekottaraṃ śatam 
ādhīśās em for āvīśās
teṣāṃ ca pṛthag ekaiko rājñāṃ dvātriṃśataḥ patiḥ  tad astu bhittvā kāṃścit tān melayiṣyāmy ahaṃ tava 
tat prātar etad gacchāmaḥ sthānaṃ valmīkasaṃjñitam  phālgunasyāsitā prātar aṣṭamī hi mahātithiḥ 
tasyāṃ cotpadyate tatra lakṣaṇaṃ cakravartinaḥ  tūrṇaṃ vidyādharā yānti tatkṛte cātra tāṃ tithim 
evaṃ sumeruṇā prokte sainyasaṃvidhinā dinam  nītvā prātar yayus tat te valmīkaṃ sabalā rathaiḥ 
tatra te dakṣiṇe sānau himādrer ninadadbalāḥ  niviṣṭā dadṛśuḥ prāptān bahūn vidyādharādhipān 
te ca vidyādharās tatra kuṇḍeṣv ādīpitānalāḥ  homapravṛttā abhavañ japavyagrāś ca kecana 
tataḥ sūryaprabho 'py atra vahnikuṇḍaṃ mahad vyadhāt  svayaṃ jajvāla tatrāgnis tasya vidyāprabhāvataḥ 
tad dṛṣṭvā tuṣṭir utpede sumeror matsaraḥ punaḥ  vidyādharāṇām udabhūt tadaikas tam abhāṣata 
vidyādharendratāṃ tyaktvā dhik sumero 'nuvartase  sūryaprabhābhidham imaṃ kathaṃ dharaṇigocaram 
tac chrutvā sa sumerus taṃ sakopaṃ nirabhartsayat  sūryaprabhaṃ ca tannāma pṛcchantam idam abravīt 
asti vidyādharo bhīmanāmā tasya ca gehinīm  brahmākāmayata svairaṃ tata eṣo 'bhyajāyata 
guptaṃ yad brahmaṇo jāto brahmaguptas tad ucyate  ata evaitad etasya svajanmasadṛśaṃ vacaḥ 
ity uktvākāri tenāpi vahnikuṇḍaṃ sumeruṇā  tataḥ sūryaprabhas tena sahāhauṣīd dhutāśanam 
kṣaṇāc ca bhūmivivarād ujjagāmātibhīṣaṇaḥ   kasmād ajagaro mahān 
taṃ grahītum adhāvat sa vidyādharapatir madāt  brahmaguptābhidhāno 'tha sumerur yena garhitaḥ 
sa tenājagareṇātra mukhaphūtkāravāyunā  nītvā hastaśate kṣipto nyapataj jīrṇaparṇavat 
tatas tejaḥprabho nāma taṃ jighṛkṣur upāgamat  sarpaṃ vidyādharādhīśaḥ so 'py akṣepi tathāmunā 
tatas taṃ duṣṭadamano nāma vidyādhareśvaraḥ  upāgāt so 'pi niḥśvāsenānyavat tena cikṣipe 
tato virūpaśaktyākhyaḥ khecarendras tam abhyagāt  so 'pi tena tathaivāstaḥ śvāsena tṛṇahelayā 
athābhyadhāvatāṃ tadvad aṅgārakavijṛmbhakau  rājānau yugapat tau ca dūre śvāsena so 'kṣipat 
evaṃ vidyādharādhīśāḥ kramāt sarve 'pi tena te  kṣiptāḥ kathaṃcid uttasthur aṅgair aśmāvacūrṇitaiḥ 
tato darpeṇa taṃ sarpaṃ śrutaśarmābhyupeyivān  jighṛkṣuḥ so 'pi tenātra cikṣipe śvāsamārutaiḥ 
adūrapatitaḥ so 'tha punar utthāya dhāvitaḥ  tena dūrataraṃ nītvā śvāsenākṣepi bhūtale 
vilakṣe cūrṇitāṅge 'sminn utthite śrutaśarmaṇi  sūryaprabho 'her grahaṇe preṣito 'bhūt sumeruṇā 
paśyataiṣo 'py ajagaraṃ grahītum imam utthitaḥ  aho ime nirvicārā markaṭā iva mānuṣāḥ 
anyena kriyamāṇaṃ yat paśyanty anuharanti tat  iti vidyādharāḥ sūryaprabhaṃ te jahasus tadā 
teṣāṃ prahasatām eva gatvā sūryaprabheṇa saḥ  stimitāsyo gṛhītaś ca kṛṣṭaś cājagaro bilāt 
tatkṣaṇaṃ pratipede sa bhujagas tūṇaratnatām  mūrdhni sūryaprabhasyāpi puṣpavṛṣṭir divo 'patat 
sūryaprabhākṣayaṃ tūṇaratnaṃ siddham idaṃ tava  tadgṛhāṇaitad ity uccair divyā vāg udabhūt tadā 
tato vidyādharā mlāniṃ yayuḥ sūryaprabho 'grahīt  tūṇaṃ mayasunīthau ca sumeruś cābhajan mudam 
śrutaśarmaṇi yāte 'tha vidyādharabalānvite  etya sūryaprabhaṃ dūtas tadīya idam abhyadhāt 
tvāṃ samādiśati śrīmāñ cchrutaśarmā prabhur yathā  samarpayaitat tūṇaṃ me kāryaṃ cej jīvitena te 
sūryaprabho 'tha pratyāha dūtedaṃ brūhi gaccha tam  svadeha eva bhavitā tūṇas te maccharāvṛtaḥ 
etat prativacaḥ śrutvā gate dūte parāṅmukhe  prāhasan rabhasoktiṃ tāṃ sarve te śrutaśarmaṇaḥ 
sūryaprabho 'tha sānandam āśliṣyoce sumeruṇā  diṣṭyādya śāṃbhavaṃ vākyaṃ phalitaṃ tad asaṃśayam 
tūṇaratne hi siddhe 'smin siddhā te cakravartitā  tad ehi sādhayedānīṃ dhanūratnaṃ nirākulaḥ 
etat sumeroḥ śrutvā te tasminn evāgrayāyini  sūryaprabhādayo jagmur hemakūṭācalaṃ tataḥ 
pārśve tasyottare te ca mānasākhyaṃ sarovaram  prāpuḥ samudranirmāṇe vidhātur iva varṇakam 
mukhāni divyanārīṇāṃ krīḍantīnāṃ jalāntare  nihnuvānaṃ maruddhūtair utphullaiḥ kanakāmbujaiḥ 
ālokayanti yāvac ca sarasas tasya te śriyam  tāvat tatrāyayuḥ sarve śrutaśarmādayo 'pi te 
tataḥ sūryaprabhas te ca homaṃ cakrur ghṛtāmbujaiḥ  kṣaṇāc cātrodagād ghoro meghas tasmāt sarovarāt 
sa vyāpya gaganaṃ megho mahad varṣam avāsṛjat  tanmadhye ca papātaiko nāgaḥ kālo 'mbudāt tataḥ 
sumeruvākyāc cotthāya gāḍhaṃ sūryaprabheṇa yat  gṛhīto vidhyamāno 'pi tat sa nāgo 'bhavad dhanuḥ 
tasmin dhanuṣṭvam āpanne dvitīyo 'bhrāt tato 'patat  nāgo viṣāgnivitrāsanaśyanniḥśeṣakhecaraḥ 
so 'pi sūryaprabheṇātra gṛhītas tena pūrvavat  dhanurguṇatvaṃ saṃprāpa meghaś cāśu nanāśa saḥ 
sūryaprabhāmitabalaṃ siddham etad dhanus tava  acchedyaś ca guṇo 'py eṣa ratne ete gṛhāṇa tat 
ity aśrāvi ca vāg divyā puṣpavṛṣṭipuraḥsarā  sūryaprabhaś ca saguṇaṃ dhanūratnaṃ tad agrahīt 
śrutaśarmāpy agād vignaḥ sānugaḥ sa tapovanam  sūryaprabho 'tha sarve ca harṣam āpur mayādayaḥ 
pṛṣṭo 'tha dhanurutpattiṃ taiḥ sumerur uvāca saḥ  iha kīcakaveṇūnāṃ divyam asti vanaṃ mahat 
tato ye kīcakāś chittvā kṣipyante 'tra sarovare  mahānty etāni divyāni saṃpadyante dhanūṃṣi te 
sādhitāni ca tāny eva devais tais taiḥ purātmanaḥ  asurair atha gandharvais tathā vidyādharottamaiḥ 
bhinnāni teṣāṃ nāmāni cakravartidhanūṃṣi tu  atrāmitabalākhyāni nikṣiptāni purā suraiḥ 
mita em for mṛta
tāni caitaiḥ parikleśaiḥ sidhyanti śubhakarmaṇām  keṣāṃcid īśvarecchāto bhaviṣyaccakravartinām 
tac ca sūryaprabhasyaitat siddham adya mahad dhanuḥ  svocitāni vayasyās tat sādhayantv asya tāny amī 
yeṣāṃ hi siddhavidyānāṃ vīrāṇām asti yogyatā  yathānurūpaṃ bhavyānāṃ siddhyanty adyāpi tāni hi 
etat sumeruvacanaṃ śrutvā sūryaprabhasya te  vayasyāḥ kīcakavanaṃ tat prabhāsādayo yayuḥ 
tadrakṣakaṃ ca rājānaṃ caṇḍadaṇḍaṃ vijitya te  ānīya kīcakāṃs tatra nidadhuḥ saraso 'ntare 
tattīropoṣitānāṃ ca japatāṃ juhvatāṃ tathā  sidhyanti sma dhanūṃṣy eṣāṃ saptāhāt sattvaśālinām 
prāptais tair uktavṛttāntair mayādyaiś ca sahātha saḥ  āgāt sūryaprabhas tāvat tat sumeros tapovanam 
tatrovāca sumerus taṃ jito veṇuvaneśvaraḥ  tvanmittraiś caṇḍadaṇḍo yad ajeyo 'pi tad adbhutam 
tasyāsti mohinī nāma vidyā tena sa durjayaḥ  nūnaṃ sā sthāpitā tena pradhānasya ripoḥ kṛte 
ataḥ prayuktā naiteṣu tvadvayasyeṣu saṃprati  sakṛd eva hi sā tasya phaladā na punaḥ punaḥ 
gurāv eva hi sā tena prabhāvāvekṣaṇāya bhoḥ  prayuktābhūd ataḥ śāpas tena datto 'sya tādṛśaḥ 
tac cintyam etad vidyānāṃ prabhāvo hi durāsadaḥ  tatkāraṇaṃ ca bhavatā pṛcchyatāṃ bhagavān mayaḥ 
asyāgre kim ahaṃ vacmi kaḥ pradīpo raveḥ puraḥ  evaṃ sumeruṇā sūryaprabhasyokte mayo 'bravīt 
satyaṃ sumeruṇoktaṃ te saṃkṣepāc chṛṇu vacmy adaḥ  avyaktāt prabhavantīha tās tāḥ śaktyanuśaktayaḥ 
tatrodgataḥ prāṇaśakter nādo bindupathāśritaḥ  vidyādimantratām eti paratattvakalānvitaḥ 
tāsāṃ ca mantravidyānāṃ jñānena tapasāpi vā  siddhājñayā vā siddhānāṃ prabhāvo duratikramaḥ 
tat putra sarvavidyās te siddhā dvābhyāṃ tu hīyase  mohinīparivartinyau na vidye sādhite tvayā 
yājñavalkyaś ca te vetti tad gaccha prārthayasva tam  evaṃ mayoktyā tasya rṣer yayau sūryaprabho 'ntikam 
sa munis taṃ ca saptāhaṃ nivāsya bhujagahrade  agnimadhye tryahaṃ caiva tapaścaryām akārayat 
dadau soḍhāhidaṃśasya saptāhāc cāsya mohinīm  vidyāṃ visoḍhavahneś ca tryahād viparivartinīm 
prāptavidyasya bhūyo 'pi vahnikuṇḍapraveśanam  tasyādideśa sa muniḥ sa tathety akaroc ca tat 
tatkṣaṇaṃ ca mahāpadmavimānaṃ tasya kāmagam  abhūd upanataṃ sūryaprabhasya gaganecaram 
aṣṭottareṇa pattrāṇāṃ purāṇāṃ ca śatena yat  alaṃkṛtaṃ mahāratnair nānārūpair vinirmitam 
cakravartivimānaṃ te siddham etad amuṣya ca  pureṣv antaḥpurāṇy eṣu sarveṣu sthāpayiṣyasi 
yena tāny apradhṛṣyāṇi bhaviṣyanti bhavaddviṣām  ity antarikṣād dhīraṃ tam uvācātha sarasvatī 
tataḥ sa yājñavalkyaṃ taṃ guruṃ prahvo vyajijñapat  ādiśyatāṃ prayacchāmi kīdṛśīṃ dakṣiṇām iti 
nijābhiṣekakāle māṃ smarer eṣaiva dakṣiṇā  gaccha tāvat svakaṃ sainyam iti taṃ so 'bravīn muniḥ 
natvā tatas taṃ sa muniṃ vimānaṃ cādhiruhya tat  tat sumerunivāsasthaṃ sainyaṃ sūryaprabho yayau 
tatrākhyātasvavṛttāntaṃ sasunīthasumeravaḥ  siddhavidyāvimānaṃ tam abhyanandan mayādayaḥ 
tataḥ sunīthaḥ sasmāra taṃ suvāsakumārakam  sa cāgatya mayādīṃs tāñ jagādaivaṃ sarājakān 
siddhaṃ vimānaṃ vidyāś ca sarvāḥ sūryaprabhasya tat  udāsīnāḥ kim adyāpi sthitāḥ stha ripunirjaye 
tac chrutvā sa mayo 'vādīd yuktaṃ bhagavatoditam  kiṃ tu prāk preṣyatāṃ dūto nītis tāvat prayujyatām 
evaṃ mayāsureṇokte so 'bravīn muniputrakaḥ  astv evaṃ kā kṣatis tarhi prahastaḥ preṣyatām ayam 
eṣa sapratibho vagmī gatijñaḥ kāryakālayoḥ  karkaśaś ca sahiṣṇuś ca sarvadūtaguṇānvitaḥ 
iti tadvacanaṃ sarve śraddhāya vyasṛjaṃs tataḥ  prahastaṃ dattasaṃdeśaṃ dautyāya śrutaśarmaṇe 
tasmin gate 'bravīt sūryaprabhas tān nikhilān nijān  śrūyatāṃ yan mayā dṛṣṭam apūrvaṃ svapnakautukam 
jāne 'dya kṣīyamāṇāyāṃ paśyāmi rajanāv aham  yāvan mahājalaughena vayaṃ sarve hriyāmahe 
hriyamāṇāś ca nṛtyāmo na majjāmaḥ kathaṃ cana  athaughaḥ sa parāvṛttaḥ pratikūlena vāyunā 
tataḥ kenāpi puruṣeṇaitya jvalitatejasā  uddhṛtya vahnau kṣiptāḥ smo na ca dahyamahe 'gninā 
etyātha megho raktaughaṃ pravṛṣṭas tena cāsṛjā  vyāptā diśas tato nidrā naṣṭā me niśayā saha 
ity uktavantaṃ taṃ smāha sa suvāsakumārakaḥ  āyāsapūrvo 'bhyudayaḥ svapnenānena sūcitaḥ 
yo jalaughaḥ sa saṅgrāmo dhairyaṃ tad yad amajjanam  nṛtyatāṃ hriyamāṇānāṃ jalais tatparivartakaḥ 
yo yuṣmākaṃ marut so 'pi śaraṇaḥ ko'pi rakṣitā  yaś coddhartā jvalattejāḥ pumān sākṣāt sa śaṃkaraḥ 
kṣiptāḥ sthāgnau ca yat tena tan nyastāḥ stha mahāmṛdhe  meghodayas tato yac ca sa bhūyo 'pi bhayāgamaḥ 
raktaughavarṣaṇaṃ yac ca tad bhayasya vināśanam  diśāṃ yad raktapūrṇatvam ṛddhiḥ sā mahatī ca vaḥ 
svapnaś cānekadhānyārtho yathārtho 'pārtha eva ca  yaḥ sadyaḥ sūcayaty artham anyārthaḥ so 'bhidhīyate 
prasannadevatādeśarūpaḥ svapno yathārthakaḥ  gāḍhānubhavacintādikṛtam āhur apārthakam 
rajomūḍhena manasā bāhyārthavimukhena hi  jantur nidrāvaśaḥ svapnaṃ tais taiḥ paśyati kāraṇaiḥ 
ciraśīghraphalatvaṃ ca tasya kālaviśeṣataḥ  eṣa rātryantadṛṣṭas tu svapnaḥ śīghraphalapradaḥ 
etan munikumārāt te śrutvā tasmāt sunirvṛtāḥ  utthāya dinakartavyaṃ vyadhuḥ sūryaprabhādayaḥ 
tāvat prahastaḥ pratyāgāc chrutaśarmasakāśataḥ  pṛṣṭo mayādibhiś caivaṃ yathāvṛttam avarṇayat 
ito gato 'haṃ tarasā trikūṭācalavartinīm  tāṃ trikūṭapatākākhyāṃ nagarīṃ hemanirmitām 
tasyāṃ praviśya cāpaśyam ahaṃ kṣattṛniveditaḥ  vṛtaṃ taṃ śrutaśarmāṇaṃ tais tair vidyādharādhipaiḥ 
pitrā trikūṭasenena tathā vikramaśaktinā  dhuraṃdhareṇa cānyaiś ca śūrair dāmodarādibhiḥ 
dhareṇa em for dhureṇa
upaviśyātha tam ahaṃ śrutaśarmāṇam abhyadhām  śrīmatā prahitaḥ sūryaprabheṇāhaṃ tvadantikam 
saṃdiṣṭaṃ tena cedaṃ te prasādād dhūrjaṭer mayā  vidyā ratnāni bhāryāś ca sahāyāś caiva sādhitāḥ 
tad ehi mila sainye me sahaitaiḥ khecareśvaraiḥ  nihantāhaṃ viruddhānāṃ rakṣitā namatāṃ punaḥ 
yā cāgamyā hṛtājñāte sunīthatanayā tvayā  kāmacūḍāmaṇiḥ kanyā muñca tām aśubhaṃ hi tat 
evaṃ mayokte sarve te kruddhās tatraivam abhyadhuḥ  ko nāma sa yad asmāsu darpāt saṃdiśatīdṛśam 
martyeṣu saṃdiśatv evaṃ kas tu vidyādhareṣu saḥ  varāko mānuṣo bhūtvāpy evaṃ dṛpyan vinaṅkṣyati 
tac chrutvoktaṃ mayā kiṃ kiṃ ko nāma sa niśamyatām  sa hareṇeha yuṣmākaṃ cakravartī vinirmitaḥ 
martyo vā yadi tan martyair devatvam api sādhitam  vidyādharaiś ca martyasya tasya dṛṣṭaḥ parākramaḥ 
nāśaś cehāgate tasmin kadācid vo hi dṛśyate  ity evokte mayā kruddhā sā sabhā kṣobham āyayau 
adhāvatāṃ ca hantuṃ māṃ śrutaśarmadhuraṃdharau  evaṃ paśyāmi śauryaṃ vām ity avocam ahaṃ ca tau 
tato dāmodareṇaitāv utthāya vinivāritau  śāntaṃ dūtaś ca vipraś ca na vadhya iti jalpatā 
tato vikramaśaktir mām avādīd gaccha dūta bhoḥ  tvatsvāmīva hi sarve 'pi vayam īśvaranirmitāḥ 
tad āyātu sa paśyāmas tasyātithyakṣamā vayam  evaṃ sagarvaṃ tenokte vihasann aham abravam 
haṃsāḥ padmavane tāvan nādaṃ kurvanti susthitāḥ  yāvat paśyanti nāyāntaṃ megham ācchāditāmbaram 
ity uktvotthāya sāvajñaṃ nirgatyāham ihāgataḥ  etat prahastāc chrutvā tais tuṣṭiḥ prāpi mayādibhiḥ 
niścitya cāhavodyogaṃ sarve senāpatiṃ vyadhuḥ  prabhāsam atha te sūryaprabhādyā raṇadurmadam 
sarve ca raṇadīkṣāyāṃ te suvāsakumārataḥ  nideśaṃ prāpya tad ahaḥ prāviśan niyatavratāḥ 
rātrau sūryaprabhaś cātra vrataśayyāgṛhāntaram  praviṣṭām aikṣatāpūrvām anidro varakanyakām 
sā tasya vyājasuptasya prasuptasacivasya ca  svairaṃ nikaṭam āgatya sakhīm āha sahasthitām 
yadi suptasya viśrāntavilāsāpīyam īdṛśī  rūpaśobhāsya tat kīdṛk prabuddhasya bhavet sakhi 
tad astu na prabodhyo 'sau pūritaṃ kautukaṃ dṛśoḥ  adhikaṃ hi nibaddhena kim atra hṛdayena me 
bhaviṣyaty asya saṅgrāmaḥ samaṃ hi śrutaśarmaṇā  tat tatra ko vijānāti bhavitā kila kasya kim 
prāṇavyayāya śūrāṇāṃ jāyate hi raṇotsavaḥ  tatrāsyāstu śivaṃ tāvat tato jñāsyāmahe punaḥ 
kāmacūḍāmaṇir yena kiṃ ca vyomavihāriṇā  dṛṣṭā tasyāsya hṛdayaṃ mādṛśī kā nu rañjayet 
evaṃ tayokte sāvādīt tatsakhī kiṃ bravīṣy adaḥ  asaṅgo hṛdayasyāsminn āyattaś caṇḍi kiṃ tava 
yena dṛṣṭena hṛdayaṃ kāmacūḍāmaṇer hṛtam  so 'nyasyā na haret kasyā yadi sākṣād arundhatī 
vidyāvaśāc ca kalyāṇaṃ vetsi kiṃ nāsya saṃgare  etasya bhāryāś coktāḥ stha siddhaiḥ saccakravartinaḥ 
kāmacūḍāmaṇis tvaṃ ca suprabhā caikagotrajā  eṣv eva pariṇītā ca dineṣv etena suprabhā 
tat kim asyāśivaṃ yuddhe na hi siddhavaco mṛṣā  kiṃ cāhṛtaṃ suprabhayā cittaṃ yasyāsya tasya kim 
nāhared bhavatī tvaṃ hi rūpeṇābhyadhikānaghe  bāndhavāpekṣayā vā te vikalpo yadi tan na sat 
aghe em for adhe
bhartāraṃ hi vinā nānyaḥ satīnām asti bāndhavaḥ  etatsakhīvacaḥ śrutvā sāvocad varakanyakā 
satyaṃ sakhi tvayā proktaṃ na kāryaṃ me 'nyabandhubhiḥ  saṃkhye cāsyāryaputrasya jayaṃ jāne svavidyayā 
siddhāni cāsya ratnāni vidyāś cādyāpi kiṃ punaḥ  naitasyauṣadhayaḥ siddhās tena me dūyate manaḥ 
candrapādagirau tāś ca sarvāḥ santi guhāntare  sidhyanti puṇyabhājaś ca cakravartina eva tāḥ 
tad eṣa sādhayed gatvā tatra sarvauṣadhīr yadi  bhadraṃ tat syād yad āsannaḥ prātar asya mahāhavaḥ 
etac chrutvākhilaṃ tyaktvā vyājanidrāṃ sa utthitaḥ  sūryaprabhaḥ savinayaṃ tām uvācātra kanyakām 
darśito 'tīva mugdhākṣi pakṣapāto mayi tvayā  tad eṣa tatra gacchāmi kāsi tvam iti śaṃsa me 
etac chrutvā śrutaṃ sarvam aneneti trapānatā  tūṣṇīṃ babhūva sā kanyā tatsakhī tu jagāda sā 
eṣā vidyādharendrasya sumeror anujātmajā  kanyā vilāsinī nāma tvaddarśanasakautukā 
evam uktavatīm eva tāṃ sakhīṃ sā vilāsinī  ehi saṃprati gacchāva ity uktvā prayayau tataḥ 
tataḥ prabhāsādibhyas tat prabodhya tadudīritam  sūryaprabhaḥ svamantribhyaḥ śaśaṃsauṣadhisādhanam 
visasarja prahastaṃ ca yogyaṃ tatsādhanāya saḥ  tad ākhyātuṃ sunīthasya sumeroś ca mayasya ca 
tair āgataiḥ śraddadhānaiḥ samaṃ sa sacivānvitaḥ  niśi sūryaprabhaḥ prāyāc candrapādācalaṃ prati 
gacchatāṃ ca kramāt teṣām uttasthur mārgarodhinaḥ  yakṣaguhyakakūṣmāṇḍā vighnā nānāyudhodyatāḥ 
kāṃścid astrair vimohyaitān kāṃścit saṃstabhya vidyayā  candrapādagiriṃ taṃ te prāpuḥ sūryaprabhādayaḥ 
tatraiṣāṃ tadguhādvāraprāptānāṃ śāṃkarā gaṇāḥ  etya praveśaṃ rurudhur vicitravikṛtānanāḥ 
etaiḥ saha na yoddhavyaṃ kupyed dhi bhagavān haraḥ  tannāmāṣṭasahasreṇa tam eva varadaṃ stumaḥ 
tenaiva te prasīdanti tadgaṇā ity avocata  sa suvāsakumāras tān atha sūryaprabhādikān 
tatas tatheti sarve te tathaiva haram astuvan  svāmistutiprasannāś ca tān vadanti sma te gaṇāḥ 
mukteyaṃ vo guhāsmābhir gṛhṇītāsyāṃ mahauṣadhīḥ  sūryaprabheṇa tv etasyāṃ na praveṣṭavyam ātmanā 
prabhāsaḥ praviśatv etām etasya sugamā hy asau  etad gaṇavacaḥ sarve te tathety anumenire 
tataḥ praviśatas tasya prabhāsasya tadaiva sā  guhā baddhāndhakārāpi suprakāśā kim apy abhūt 
utthāya ca mahāghorarūpā apy atra rākṣasāḥ  catvāraḥ kiṃkarā ūcuḥ praṇatāḥ praviśeti tam 
atha praviśya saṃgṛhya divyāḥ saptauṣadhīḥ sa tāḥ  prabhāso nirgataḥ sūryaprabhāya nikhilā dadau 
mahāprabhāvāḥ saptaitāḥ siddhāḥ sūryaprabhādya te  oṣadhya iti tatkālaṃ gaganād udagād vacaḥ 
tac chrutvā muditāḥ sūryaprabhādyāḥ sarva eva te  svasainyam āyayuḥ kṣipraṃ sumervāspadam āśritam 
tatrāpṛcchat sunītho 'tha taṃ suvāsakumārakam  mune sūryaprabhaṃ hitvā prabhāsaḥ kiṃ praveśitaḥ 
gaṇair guhāyāṃ kiṃ caiṣa kiṃkarair api satkṛtaḥ  etac chrutvā sa sarveṣu śṛṇvatsu munir abhyadhāt 
gaṇair em for guṇair
śrūyatāṃ kathayāmy etat prabhāso hitakṛt param  sūryaprabhasyātmabhūto na bhedo 'sty anayor dvayoḥ 
kiṃ ca prabhāsena samo nānyaḥ śauryaprabhāvavān  asti prāgjanmasukṛtair etadīyā ca sā guhā 
yo 'yaṃ yādṛk purā cābhūt tad idaṃ kathayāmi vaḥ  babhūva namucir nāma pūrvaṃ dānavasattamaḥ 
yasya dānaprasaktasya mahāvīrasya nābhavat  adeyam ahitāyāpi yācamānāya kiṃcana 
daśavarṣasahasrāṇi sa taptvā dhūmapas tapaḥ  lohāśmakāṣṭhāvadhyatvaṃ viriñcāt prāptavān varam 
tato sakṛd vijityendraṃ kāṃdiśīkaṃ sa taṃ vyadhāt  tat prārthya kaśyaparṣis taṃ devaiḥ saṃdhim akārayat 
atha viśrāntavairās te saṃmantryaiva surāsurāḥ  dugdhāmbhonidhim abhyetya mamanthur mandarādriṇā 
tato 'cyutādayo bhāgān kamalāprabhṛtīn yathā  prāpus tathoccaiḥśravasaṃ hayaṃ namucir āptavān 
anye devāsurāś cānyān pradiṣṭān brahmaṇā pṛthak  lebhire vividhān bhāgān mathyamānārṇavotthitān 
manthaparyantalabdhe ca tridaśair amṛte hṛte  teṣām athāsurāṇāṃ ca punar vairam ajāyata 
tato devāsuraraṇe jaghne yo yo 'suraḥ suraiḥ  āghrāyoccaiḥśravās taṃ taṃ jīvāyām āsa tatkṣaṇam 
ajeyā jajñire tena devānāṃ daityadānavāḥ  tato viṣaṇṇaṃ vakti sma rahaḥ śakraṃ bṛhaspatiḥ 
ekas tavātropāyo 'sti taṃ kuruṣvāvilambitam  svayaṃ yācasva gatvā tvaṃ namuciṃ taṃ hayottamam 
vipakṣāyāpi tubhyaṃ taṃ sa hayaṃ na na dāṣyati  khaṇḍayiṣyati nājanmasaṃcitaṃ dātṛtāyaśaḥ 
ity ukto devaguruṇā mahendras tridaśaiḥ saha  gatvā yayāce namuciṃ tam uccaiḥśravasaṃ hayam 
na me parāṅmukho gacchaty arthī tatrāpi vāsavaḥ  tad asmai namucir bhūtvā dadyāṃ nāhaṃ kathaṃ hayam 
jagatsu dātṛtākīrtir yā mayā ciram arjitā  sā cen mlāniṃ gatā tan me kiṃ śriyā jīvitena vā 
iti saṃcintya śakrāya tam uccaiḥśravasaṃ dadau  vāryamāṇo 'pi śukreṇa namuciḥ sa mahāśayaḥ 
namuciḥ em for namuciṃ
dattāśvam atha viśvāsya taṃ gāṅgena jaghāna saḥ  śastrādyavadhyaṃ phenena vajranyastena vṛtrahā 
aho durantā saṃsāre bhogatṛṣṇā yayā hṛtāḥ  anaucityād akīrteś ca devā api na bibhyati 
tad buddhvā tasya namucer danur mātā tapobalāt  cakāra duḥkhasaṃtaptā saṃkalpaṃ śokaśāntaye 
sa eva me punar garbhe saṃbhūyān namucir balī  bhūyāc ca sarvadevānām ajeyaḥ saṃyugeṣv iti 
tataḥ sa tasyāḥ saṃbhūya garbhe jāto 'suraḥ punaḥ  sarvaratnamayo nāmnā prabalo balayogataḥ 
so 'pi taptatapāḥ prīṇan prāṇair apy arthinaḥ kṛtī  śatakṛtvo jigāyendraṃ prabalo dānaveśvaraḥ 
tataḥ saṃmantrya devās tam upetyaivaṃ yayācire  dehaṃ puruṣamedhārtham asmabhyaṃ dehi sarvathā 
tac chrutvā sa ripubhyo 'pi tebhyo deham adān nijam  prāṇān udārā visṛjanty arthino na parāṅmukhān 
tataḥ sa khaṇḍaśo devaiḥ kṛtaḥ prabaladānavaḥ  manuṣyaloke jāto 'dya prabhāsavapuṣā punaḥ 
tad evam ādau namucis tato 'bhūt prabalaś ca saḥ  saiṣa prabhāsas tatpuṇyaprabhāvād durjayo 'ribhiḥ 
yā ca saṃbandhinī tasya prabalasyauṣadhīguhā  tena prabhāsasyātmīyā vaśyā sāsya sakiṃkarā 
tadadhaś cāsti pātāle mandiraṃ prabalasya tat  yatra dvādaśa santy asya mukhyabhāryāḥ svalaṃkṛtāḥ 
vividhāni ca ratnāni nānāpraharaṇāni ca  cintāmaṇiś ca lakṣaṃ ca yodhānāṃ turagās tathā 
tat prabhāsasya saṃbandhi sarvam asya purārjitam  tad īdṛśaḥ prabhāso 'yaṃ nāsyedaṃ kiṃcid adbhutam 
evaṃ tato munikumārakato niśamya sūryaprabhaprabhṛtayaḥ samayaprabhāsāḥ  ratnādy avāptum atha tat prayayus tadaiva pātālagaṃ prabalaveśmabilapraveśam 
tena praviśya parigṛhya ca pūrvapatnīś cintāmaṇiṃ ca turagān asurāṃś ca yodhān  nirgatya cāttanikhiladraviṇaḥ sa ekaḥ sūryaprabhaṃ kim api toṣitavān prabhāsaḥ 
atha samayasunīthaḥ saprabhāsaḥ sumeruprabhṛtibhir anuyāto rājabhir mantribhiś ca  drutam abhimatasiddhiṃ prāpya sūryaprabho 'sau punar api nijasenāsaṃniveśaṃ tam āgāt 
tatra so 'suranarādhipādiṣu svasvavāsakagateṣu teṣu tam  rātriśeṣam anayat kuśāstare saṃnigṛhya raṇadīkṣitaḥ punaḥ 
iti mahākaviśrīsomadevabhaṭṭaviracite kathāsaritsāgare sūryaprabhalambake tṛtīyas taraṅgaḥ  caturthas taraṅgaḥ  tataḥ prātaḥ samaṃ sainyaiḥ sa sumerutapovanāt  tasmāt sūryaprabhaḥ prāyāc chrutaśarmajigīṣayā 
tannivāsasya nikaṭaṃ trikūṭādrer avāpya ca  āvāsito 'bhūt tatrasthaṃ balenotsārya tadbalam 
āvāsite ca tatrāsmin sasumerumayādike  āsthānasthe trikūṭeśasaṃbandhī dūta āyayau 
sa cāgatya jagādaivaṃ sumeruṃ khecareśvaram  śrutaśarmapitā rājā tava saṃdiṣṭavān idam 
dūrasthasya na te 'smābhir ācāro jātucit kṛtaḥ  adyāsmadviṣayaṃ prāptaḥ sa tvaṃ prāghuṇikaiḥ saha 
tad ātithyam idānīṃ vo vidhāsyāmo yathocitam  śrutvaitaṃ śatrusaṃdeśaṃ sumeruḥ pratyuvāca tam 
sādhu nāsmatsamaṃ pātram atithiṃ prāpsyathāparam  ātithyaṃ na pare loke dāsyatīhaiva tatphalam 
tad ime vayam ātithyaṃ kriyatām ity udāhṛte  sumeruṇā tathaivāgāt sa dūtaḥ svaṃ prabhuṃ prati 
athonnatapradeśasthās te tu sūryaprabhādayaḥ  sainyāni dadṛśuḥ svāni niviṣṭāni pṛthak pṛthak 
tataḥ sunīthaḥ pitaraṃ svam uvāca mayāsuram  pravibhāgaṃ rathādīnām asmatsainye 'tra śaṃsa naḥ 
evaṃ karomi śṛṇutety uktvāṅgulyā nidarśayan  dānavendraḥ sa sarvajño vaktum evaṃ pracakrame 
asau subāhur nirghāto muṣṭiko goharas tathā  pralambaś ca pramāthaś ca kaṅkaṭaḥ piṅgalo 'pi ca 
vasudattādayaś caite rājāno 'rdharathā ime  aṅkurī suviśālaś ca daṇḍibhūṣaṇasomilāḥ 
unmattako devaśarmā pitṛśarmā kumārakaḥ  ete saharidattādyāḥ sarve pūrṇarathā matāḥ 
prakampano darpitaś ca kumbhīro mātṛpālitaḥ  mahābhaṭaḥ sograbhaṭo vīrasvāmī surādharaḥ 
bhaṇḍīraḥ siṃhadattaś ca guṇavarmā sakīṭakaḥ  bhīmo bhayaṃkaraś ceti sarve 'mī dviguṇā rathāḥ 
virocano vīraseno yajñaseno 'tha khujjaraḥ  indravarmā śabarakaḥ krūrakarmā nirāsakaḥ 
bhaveyus triguṇā ete rathā rājasutāḥ suta  suśarmā bāhuśālī ca viśākhaḥ krodhano 'py ayam 
pracaṇḍaś cety amī rājaputrā rathacaturguṇāḥ  juñjarī vīravarmā ca pravīravara eva ca 
supratijño 'marārāmaś caṇḍadatto 'tha jālikaḥ  trayaḥ siṃhabhaṭavyāghrabhaṭaśatrubhaṭā api 
rājāno rājaputrāś ca rathāḥ pañcaguṇā amī  ugravarmā tv ayaṃ rājaputraḥ syāt ṣaḍguṇo rathaḥ 
rājaputro viśākhaś ca sutantuḥ sugamo 'pi ca  narendraśarmā cety ete rathāḥ saptaguṇā matāḥ 
mahārathaḥ punar ayaṃ sahasrāyunṛpātmajaḥ  mahārathānāṃ yūthasya śatānīkas tv ayaṃ patiḥ 
subhāsaharṣavimalāḥ sūryaprabhavayasyakāḥ  mahābuddhyacalākhyau ca priyaṃkaraśubhaṃkarau 
ete mahārathā yajñarucidharmarucī tathā  evaṃ viśvarucir bhāsaḥ siddhārthaś cety amī trayaḥ 
sūryaprabhasya sacivāḥ syur mahārathayūthapāḥ  prahastaś ca mahārthaś ca tasyātirathayūthapau 
yūthapau rathayūthānāṃ prajñāḍhyasthirabuddhikau  dānavaḥ sarvadamanas tathā pramathano 'py asau 
dhūmaketuḥ pravahaṇo vajrapañjara eva ca  kālacakro marudvego rathātirathapā amī 
prakampanaḥ siṃhanādo rathātirathayūthapau  mahāmāyaḥ kāmbalikaḥ kālakampanako 'py ayam 
rathāti em for rathāri
prahṛṣṭaromā cety ete catvāro 'py asurādhipāḥ  putr ātirathayūthādhipatīnām adhipā ime 
sūryaprabhasamaś cāyaṃ prabhāsaḥ sainyanāyakaḥ  sumerutanayaś caiṣa śrīkuñjarakumārakaḥ 
dvau mahārathayūthādhipatiyūthādhipāv imau  ity ete 'smadbale 'nye ca śūrāḥ svaiḥ svair balair vṛtāḥ 
parasainye 'dhikāḥ santi tathāpy asmadbalasya te  na paryāptā bhaviṣyanti saprasāde maheśvare 
iti yāvat sunīthaṃ taṃ bravīti sa mayāsuraḥ  śrutaśarmapituḥ pārśvād dūto 'nyas tāvad āyayau 
sa covāca trikūṭādhipatir evaṃ bravīti vaḥ  saṅgrāmo nāma śūrāṇām utsavo hi mahān ayam 
tasyaiṣā saṃkaṭā bhūmis tasmād āgamyatām itaḥ  yāmaḥ kalāpagrāmākhyaṃ pradeśaṃ vipulāntaram 
etac chrutvā sunīthādyāḥ sainyaiḥ saha tatheti te  sarve kalāpagrāmaṃ taṃ sūryaprabhayutā yayuḥ 
śrutaśarmādayas te 'pi tathaiva samaronmukhāḥ  tam eva deśam ājagmur vidyādharabalair vṛtāḥ 
śrutaśarmabale dṛṣṭvā gajān sūryaprabhādayaḥ  ānāyayan gajānīkaṃ svaṃ vimānādhiropitam 
tataḥ senāpatiś cakre senāyāṃ śrutaśarmaṇaḥ  dāmodaro mahāsūcivyūhaṃ vidyādharottamaḥ 
tatra pārśve svayaṃ tasthau śrutaśarmā samantrikaḥ  agre dāmodaraś cāsīd anyatrānye mahārathāḥ 
sainye sūryaprabhasyāpi prabhāso 'nīkinīpatiḥ  ardhacandraṃ vyadhād vyūhaṃ madhye tasyābhavat svayam 
sakuñjarakumāraś ca prahastaś cāsya koṇayoḥ  sūryaprabhasunīthādyās tasthuḥ sarve 'tra pṛṣṭhataḥ 
sumerau tatsamīpasthe sasuvāsakumārake  āhanyanta raṇātodyāny ubhayor api sainyayoḥ 
tāvac ca gaganaṃ devaiḥ saṅgrāmaṃ draṣṭum āgataiḥ  sendraiḥ salokapālaiś ca sāpsaraskair apūryata 
āyayau cātra viśveśaḥ śaṃkaraḥ pārvatīyutaḥ  devatābhir gaṇair bhūtair mātṛbhiś cāpy anudrutaḥ 
āgāc ca bhagavān brahmā sāvitryādibhir anvitaḥ  mūrtair vedaiś ca śāstraiś ca nikhilaiś ca maharṣibhiḥ 
ājagāma ca devībhir lakṣmīkīrtijayādibhiḥ  dhṛtacakrāyudho devaḥ pakṣirājaratho hariḥ 
sabhāryaḥ kaśyapo 'py āgād ādityā vasavo 'pi ca  yakṣarākṣasanāgendrāḥ prahlādādyās tathāsurāḥ 
tair āvṛte nabhobhāge śastrasaṃpātadāruṇaḥ  prāvartata mahānādaḥ saṅgrāmaḥ senayos tayoḥ 
dikcakre bāṇajālena ghanenācchādite tadā  anyonyaśarasaṃgharṣajātānalataḍillate 
śastrakṣatagajāśvaugharaktadhārāvapūritāḥ  vīrakāyavahadgrāhā niryayuḥ śoṇitāpagāḥ 
nṛtyatāṃ taratāṃ rakte nadatāṃ cotsavāya saḥ  śūrāṇāṃ pheravāṇāṃ ca bhūtānaṃ cābhavad raṇaḥ 
śānte tumulasaṅgrāme nihatāsaṃkhyasainike  lakṣyamāṇe vibhāge ca śanaiḥ svaparasainyayoḥ 
pratipakṣapravīrāṇāṃ prayuddhānāṃ sumerutaḥ  nāmādau śrūyamāṇe ca kramāt sūryaprabhādibhiḥ 
pūrvaṃ subāhor nṛpater vidyādharapates tathā  aṭṭahāsābhidhānasya dvandvayuddham abhūd dvayoḥ 
suciraṃ yudhyamānasya tasya viddhasya sāyakaiḥ  aṭṭahāso 'rdhacandreṇa subāhor acchinac chiraḥ 
dṛṣṭvā subāhuṃ nihataṃ muṣṭiko 'bhyāpatat krudhā  so 'pi tenāṭṭahāsena hṛdi bāṇahato 'patat 
muṣṭike nihate kruddhaḥ pralambo nāma bhūpatiḥ  abhidhāvyāṭṭahāsaṃ taṃ śaravarṣair ayodhayat 
aṭṭahāso 'pi tatsainyaṃ hatvā hatvā ca marmaṇi  pralambam api taṃ vīraṃ rathapṛṣṭhe nyapātayat 
vīkṣya pralambaṃ nihataṃ mohano nāma bhūpatiḥ  saṃnipatyāṭṭahāsaṃ taṃ tāḍayām āsa sāyakaiḥ 
tato 'ṭṭahāsas taṃ chinnakodaṇḍaṃ hatasārathim  dṛḍhaprahārābhihataṃ pātayām āsa mohanam 
dṛṣṭvāṭṭahāsena hatāṃś caturaś catureṇa tān  śrutaśarmabalaṃ harṣād unnanāda jayonmukham 
tad dṛṣṭvā kupito harṣaḥ sūryaprabhavayasyakaḥ  sasainyam abhyadhāvat tam aṭṭahāsaṃ sasainikaḥ 
nivārya ca śarais tasya śarān sainyaṃ nihatya ca  vyāpādya sārathiṃ dvis trir dhanuś chittvā ca sadhvajam 
harṣo yad aṭṭahāsasya nirbibheda śaraiḥ śiraḥ  tenāsau rudhirodgārī nipapāta rathād bhuvi 
aṭṭahāse hate tādṛk kṣobho 'bhūd atra saṃyuge  kṣaṇād ardhāvaśeṣaṃ tad yena jajñe baladvayam 
nipetur eva nihatās tatrāśvagajapattayaḥ  raṇamūrdhani cottasthuḥ kabandhā eva kevalam 
tato vikṛtadaṃṣṭrākhyo harṣaṃ vidyādhareśvaraḥ  etyāṭṭahāsanidhanakruddho bāṇair avākirat 
harṣo 'pi tasya nirdhūya śarān sadhvajasārathīn  hatvā rathāśvāṃś ciccheda śiro lalitakuṇḍalam 
hate vikṛtadaṃṣṭre tu cakravāla iti śrutaḥ  rājā vidyādharo harṣam abhyadhāvad amarṣitaḥ 
sa yudhyamānam avadhīd asakṛcchinnakārmukam  cakravālo yudhi śrāntaṃ harṣaṃ śīrṇāparāyudham 
tatkrodhād etya nṛpatiḥ pramāthas tam ayodhayat  so 'py ahanyata tenātha cakravālena saṃyuge 
tathaiva tena cātrānye 'py ekaśo dhāvitāḥ kramāt  catvāraś cakravālena rājamukhyā nipātitāḥ 
kaṅkaṭaś ca viśālaś ca pracaṇḍaś cāṅkurī tathā  tad dṛṣṭvābhyapatat krodhān nirghāto nāma taṃ nṛpaḥ 
tau cakravālanirghātau yudhyamānau ciraṃ kramāt  anyonyacūrṇitarathāv abhūtāṃ pādacāriṇau 
asicakradharau dvāv apy ākopamilitau ca tau  khaḍgāhatidvidhābhūtamūrdhānau bhuvi petatuḥ 
vipannau vīkṣya tau vīrau viṣaṇṇe 'pi baladvaye  raṇāgram āyayau vidyādharendraḥ kālakampanaḥ 
rājaputro 'bhyadhāvac ca taṃ prakampananāmakaḥ  sa kālakampanenātra kṣaṇāt tena nyapātyata 
tasmin nipatite tasya pañcānye 'bhyapatan rathāḥ  jālikaś caṇḍadattaś ca gopakaḥ somilo 'pi ca 
pitṛśarmā ca sarve te śarāṃs tasmin sahāmucan  sa tu pañcāpi tān kālakampano virathīkṛtān 
jaghāna yugapad vidhyan nārācair hṛdi pañcabhiḥ  praṇeduḥ khecarās tena vyaṣīdan manujāsurāḥ 
tato 'bhyadhāvann apare catvāras taṃ rathāḥ samam  unmattakaḥ praśastaś ca vilambakadhuraṃdharau 
sa tān apy avadhīt kālakampano līlayākhilān  tathaiva dhāvitān anyān ṣaḍ rathān nijaghāna saḥ 
tejikaṃ geyikaṃ caiva vegilaṃ śākhilaṃ tathā  bhadraṃkaraṃ daṇḍinaṃ ca bhūrisainyān mahārathān 
aparāṃś ca punaḥ pañca so 'vadhīn militān yudhi  bhīmabhīṣaṇakumbhīravikaṭān savilocanān 
tad dṛṣṭvā kadanaṃ kālakampanena kṛtaṃ raṇe  adhāvat sugaṇo nāma rājaputro 'sya saṃmukhaḥ 
sa tena tāvad vidadhe samaṃ yuddham ubhāv api  hatāśvasārathī yāvad virathau tau babhūvatuḥ 
tatas taṃ khaḍgayuddhena sugaṇaṃ pādacāriṇam  sa kālakampanaḥ pādacāry eva bhuvi jaghnivān 
tāvac ca mānuṣair vidyādharāṇāṃ samam āhavam  asaṃbhāvyaṃ vilokyeva khinno 'staṃ prayayau raviḥ 
raktāmbupūrabharitaṃ na paraṃ samarāṅgaṇam  yāvat saṃdhyākṛtapadaṃ yayau vyomāpi śoṇatam 
kabandhaiḥ saha bhūteṣu saṃdhyānṛttodyateṣv atha  saṃhṛtya yuddhaṃ yayatuḥ svaniveśāya te bale 
śrutaśarmabale tasmin dine vīrā hatās trayaḥ  trayastriṃśat pravīrās tu bale sauryaprabhe hatāḥ 
tena bāndhavamittrādinidhanena sudurmanāḥ  sūryaprabhas triyāmāṃ tām āsīd antaḥpurair vinā 
anidra eva sacivaiḥ saha saṅgrāmasaṃkathāḥ  tās tāḥ kurvan nināyaitāṃ punaryuddhonmukho niśām 
tadbhāryāś ca milanti sma hatabāndhavaduḥkhitāḥ  ekatra tasyāṃ rajanāv anyonyāśvāsanāgatāḥ 
ruditāvasare 'py atra kathā nānāvidhā vyadhuḥ  strīṇāṃ na sa kṣaṇo yatra na kathāsv aparāśrayā 
tatprasaṅgena tatraikā rājaputrīdam abravīt  āścaryam āryaputro 'dya kathaṃ supto niraṅganaḥ 
tac chrutvā vyājahārānyā saṅgrāme svajanakṣayāt  duḥkhito hy āryaputro 'dya ramate strījane katham 
tato 'parā bravīti sma prāpnoty abhinavāṃ yadi  varakanyāṃ sa tadduḥkhaṃ vismaraty adhunaiva tat 
athetarābravīn maivaṃ yady api strīṣu lampaṭaḥ  tathāpi na sa duḥkhe 'sminn īdṛśaḥ syāt tathāvidhaḥ 
iti tāsu vadantīṣu jagādaikā savismayam  brūta strīlampaṭaḥ kasmād āryaputro batedṛśaḥ 
āhṛtāsv api bhāryāsu bhūyasīṣu navā navāḥ  aniśaṃ rājaputrīr yat sa gṛhṇan naiva tuṣyati 
etac chrutvā vidagdhaikā tāsu nāmnā manovatī  uvāca śrūyatāṃ yena rājāno bahuvallabhāḥ 
deśarūpavayaśceṣṭāvijñānādivibhedataḥ  bhinnā guṇā varastrīṇāṃ naikā sarvaguṇānvitā 
karṇāṭalāṭasaurāṣṭramadhyadeśādideśajāḥ  yoṣā deśasamācārai rañjayanti nijair nijaiḥ 
kāścid dharanti sudṛśaḥ śāradendunibhair mukhaiḥ  anyāḥ kanakakumbhābhaiḥ stanair unnatasaṃhataiḥ 
smarasiṃhāsanaprakhyair aparā jaghanasthalaiḥ  itarāś cetarair aṅgaiḥ svasaundaryamanoramaiḥ 
kācit kāñcanagaurāṅgī priyaṅguśyāmalāparā  anyā raktāvadātā ca dṛṣṭvaiva haratīkṣaṇe 
kācit pratyagrasubhagā kācit saṃpūrṇayauvanā  kācit prauḍhatvasurasā prasaradvibhramojjvalā 
hasantī śobhate kācit kācit kope 'pi hāriṇī  vrajantī gajavat kāpi haṃsavat kāpi rājate 
ālapanty amṛteneva kācid āsiñcati śrutim  sabhrūvilāsaṃ paśyantī svabhāvād bhāti kācana 
nṛttena rocate kācit kācid gītena rājate  vīṇādivādanajñānenānyā kāntā ca rocate 
kācid bāhyaratābhijñā kācid ābhyantarapriyā  prasādhanojjvalā kācit kācid vaidagdhyaśobhitā 
bhartṛcittagrahābhijñā cānyā saubhāgyam aśrute  kiyad vā vacmi bahavo 'py anye 'nyāsāṃ pṛthag guṇāḥ 
tad evam iha kasyāścid guṇaḥ ko'pi varastriyaḥ  na tu sarvaguṇāḥ sarvās trilokyām api kāścana 
ato nānārasāsvādalabdhakakṣyāḥ kileśvarāḥ  āhṛtyāpy āharantyeva bhāryā navanavāḥ sadā 
uttamās tu na vāñchanti paradārān kathaṃcana  tann āryaputrasyaiṣa syād doṣo nerṣyā ca naḥ kṣamā 
evamādyā manovatyā proktāḥ sūryaprabhāṅganāḥ  anyā madanasenādyās tathaivocuḥ kathāḥ kramāt 
tato 'tirasataś ca tā vigatayantraṇānargalāḥ parasparam upādiśan suratakāryatantrāṇy api  prasaṅgamilitāḥ kathāprasarasaktacittā mithas tad asti na kim apy aho yad iha nodvamanti striyaḥ 
atha katham api dīrghā sā kathā cātra tāsām avasitim upayātā sā ca rātriḥ krameṇa  timiravigamavelāvekṣaṇaikābhikāṅkṣo ripubalavijigīṣos tatra sūryaprabhasya 
iti mahākaviśrīsomadevabhaṭṭaviracite kathāsaritsāgare sūryaprabhalambake caturthas taraṅgaḥ  pañcamas taraṅgaḥ 
atha yuddhabhuvaṃ prātar jagmuḥ sūryaprabhādayaḥ  śrutaśarmādayas te ca saṃnaddhāḥ sabalāḥ punaḥ 
punaś ca sendrāḥ sabrahmaviṣṇurudrāḥ surāsurāḥ  sayakṣoragagandharvāḥ saṅgrāmaṃ draṣṭum āyayuḥ 
śrutaśarmabale cakravyūhaṃ dāmodaro vyadhāt  vajravyūhaṃ prabhāsaś ca sūryaprabhabale 'karot 
tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ tayor ubhayasainyayoḥ  tūryaiḥ subhaṭanādaiś ca badhirīkṛtadiktaṭam 
samyak chastrahatāḥ śūrā bhindanti mama maṇḍalam  itīva śarajālāntaśchanno bhānur abhūd bhiyā 
dāmodarakṛtaṃ cakravyuham anyena durbhidam  bhittvā prabhāsaḥ prāvikṣad atha sūryaprabhājñayā 
taṃ ca dāmodaro vyūhacchidram etyāvṛṇot svayam  prabhāso yayudhe taṃ ca tatraikaratha eva saḥ 
praviṣṭam ekakaṃ taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā sūryaprabho 'tha saḥ  paścāt pañcadaśaitasya visasarja mahārathān 
prakampanaṃ dhūmaketuṃ kālakampanakaṃ tathā  mahāmāyaṃ marudvegaṃ prahastaṃ vajrapañjaram 
kālacakraṃ pramathanaṃ siṃhanādaṃ sakambalam  vikaṭākṣaṃ pravahaṇaṃ taṃ kuñjarakumārakam 
taṃ ca prahṛṣṭaromāṇam asurādhipasattamam  te pradhāvya yayuḥ sarve vyūhadvāraṃ mahārathāḥ 
tatra dāmodaro pūrvaṃ svapauruṣam adarśayat  yad eka eva yuyudhe taiḥ pañcadaśabhiḥ saha 
tad dṛṣṭvā nāradamuniṃ pārśvasthaṃ vāsavo 'bhyadhat  sūryaprabhādyā asurāvatārā akhilās tathā 
śrutaśarmā madaṃśaś ca sarve vidyādharā ime  devāṃśās tad ayaṃ yuktyā mune devāsurāhavaḥ 
tasmiṃś ca paśya devānāṃ sahāyaḥ sarvadā hariḥ  dāmodaras tadaṃśo 'yam evaṃ tad iha yudhyate 
evaṃ śakre vadaty asya dāmodaracamūpateḥ  mahārathāḥ samājagmuḥ sāhāyyāya caturdaśa 
brahmagupto vāyubalo yamadaṃṣṭraḥ suroṣaṇaḥ  roṣāvaroho 'tibalas tejaḥprabhadhuraṃdharau 
kuberadatto varuṇaśarmā kambalikas tathā  vīraś ca duṣṭamadano dohanārohaṇāv ubhau 
dāmodarayutās te 'pi vīrāḥ pañcadaśaiva tān  sūryaprabhīyān rurudhur vīrān vyūhāgrayodhinaḥ 
tato 'tra dvandvayuddhāni teṣām āsan parasparam  dāmodareṇāstrayuddhaṃ samaṃ cakre prakampanaḥ 
brahmadattena ca samaṃ dhūmaketur ayudhyata  mahāmāyas tu yuyudhe sahaivātibalena ca 
tejaḥprabheṇa yuyudhe dānavaḥ kālakampanaḥ  saha vāyubalenāpi marudvego mahāsuraḥ 
yamadaṃṣṭreṇa ca samaṃ yuyudhe vajrapañjaraḥ  samaṃ suroṣaṇenāpi kālacakro 'surottamaḥ 
sākaṃ kuberadattena yuddhaṃ pramathano vyadhāt  siṃhanādaś ca daityendraḥ samaṃ varuṇaśarmaṇā 
yuddhaṃ pravahaṇo duṣṭadamanena sahākarot  prahṛṣṭaromā roṣāvaroheṇāpi ca dānavaḥ 
dhuraṃdhareṇa ca samaṃ vikaṭākṣo vyadhād yudham  yuddhaṃ kambalikaś cakre samaṃ kambalikena ca 
ārohaṇena ca samaṃ sa kuñjarakumārakaḥ  mahotpātāparākhyeṇa prahasto dohanena ca 
evaṃ mahārathadvandveṣv eṣu tatra parasparam  vyūhāgre yudhyamāneṣu sunītho mayam abhyadhāt 
kaṣṭam asmadrathāḥ śūrā nānāyuddhavido 'py amī  ruddhāḥ pratirathair etaiḥ paśya vyūhapraveśataḥ 
prabhāsaś caika evāgre praviṣṭo 'trāvicāritam  tan na jānīmahe kasya kim ivātra bhaviṣyati 
etac chrutvā bravīti sma taṃ suvāsakumārakaḥ  trailokye 'pi na paryāptāḥ sasurāsuramānuṣāḥ 
ekasyāsya prabhāsasya kiṃ punaḥ khecarā ime  tad eṣā katham asthāne śaṅkā vo jānatām api 
evaṃ munikumāre 'smin bruvāṇe kālakampanaḥ  vidyādharaḥ prabhāsasya yudhi saṃmukham āyayau 
tataḥ prabhāso 'vādīt taṃ re re hy apakṛtaṃ tvayā  atīva nas tad adyeha paśyāmas tava pauruṣam 
ity uktvā vyasṛjat tasmin prabhāso viśikhāvalim  so 'pi taṃ sāyakaiḥ kālakampano 'vākirac chitaiḥ 
astrapratyastrayuddhena yuyudhāte mithas tataḥ  pradattabhuvanāścaryau tau vidyādharamānuṣau 
atha prabhāso viśikhenaikenāpātayad dhvajam  dvitīyenāvadhīt kālakampanasya ca sārathim 
caturbhiś caturaś cāśvān dhanur ekena cācchinat  dvabhyāṃ hastau bhujau dvābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ ca śravaṇāv ubhau 
ekena śitadhāreṇa śiraś ciccheda tasya ca  prabhāsaḥ pattriṇā śatror darśitādbhutalāghavaḥ 
evaṃ prāṅnihitānekapravīrotthena manyunā  prabhāso nigrahaṃ kālakampanasya vyadhād iva 
dṛṣṭvā ca taṃ hataṃ vidyādhareśaṃ manujāsuraiḥ  nādaś cakre viṣādaś ca jagme sapadi khecaraiḥ 
tato vidyutprabho nāma kālañjaragirīśvaraḥ  prabhāsam abhyadhāvat taṃ krudhā vidyādharādhipaḥ 
tasyāpi yudhyamānasya prabhāsaḥ sa mahādhvajam  chittvā cakarta kodaṇḍam āttam āttaṃ punaḥ punaḥ 
tataḥ sa māyayotpatya cchanno vidyutprabho nabhaḥ  prabhāsasyopari hrīto vavarṣāsigadādikān 
prabhāso 'pi vidhūyāstrais tadāyudhaparamparām  kṛtvā prakāśanāstreṇa prakāśaṃ taṃ nabhaścaram 
dattvā mahāstram āgneyaṃ tattejodagdham ambarāt  vidyutprabhaṃ bhūmitale gatajīvam apātayat 
tad dṛṣṭvā śrutaśarmā tān nijagāda mahārathān  paśyatānena nihatau dvau mahārathayūthapau 
tat kiṃ sahadhve saṃbhūya yuṣmābhir hanyatām ayam  tac chrutvāṣṭau rathāḥ kruddhāḥ prabhāsaṃ paryavārayan 
ekaḥ kaṅkaṭakādrīndranivāsī rathayūthapaḥ  ūrdhvarometi vikhyāto vidyādharamahīpatiḥ 
dharaṇīdharaśailādhipatir vikrośanābhidhaḥ  vidyādharāṇām adhipo dvitīyaś ca mahārathaḥ 
indumālī tṛtīyaś ca līlāparvataketanaḥ  vīro 'tirathayūthasya patir vidyādharaprabhuḥ 
malayādrinivāsī ca kākāṇḍaka iti śrutaḥ  rathayūthapatī rājā caturthaḥ khecarottamaḥ 
niketādripatir nāmnā darpavāhaś ca pañcamaḥ  ṣaṣṭhaś ca dhūrtavahano nāmnāñjanagirīśvaraḥ 
vidyādharāv imau cātirathayūthapatī ubhau  saptamo gardabharatho rājā kumudaparvate 
nāmnā varāhasvāmīti yo mahārathayūthapaḥ  tadrupo dundubhikṣmābhṛd ratho medhāvaro 'ṣṭamaḥ 
ebhir aṣṭabhir āgatya muktān bāṇān vidhūya saḥ  prabhāso yugapat sarvān sāyakair vidhyati sma tān 
jaghāna kasyacic cāśvān kasyacit sārathiṃ tathā  cakarta kasyacit ketuṃ kasyacic cācchinad dhanuḥ 
medhāvaraṃ caturbhis tu śarair viddhvā samaṃ hṛdi  apātayan mahīpṛṣṭhe sadyo 'pahṛtajīvitam 
tataś ca yodhayann anyān kuñcitodbaddhakuntalam  śareṇāñjalikenārād ūrdhvaromṇaḥ śiro 'cchinat 
śeṣāṃś ca ṣaṭ tān ekaikabhallanirlūnakaṃdharān  hatāśvasārathīn kṛtvā sa prabhāso nyapātayat 
papāta puṣpavṛṣṭiś ca tasya mūrdhni tato divaḥ  uttejitāsuranṛpā vicchāyīkṛtakhecarā 
tato 'nye tatra catvāraḥ preṣitāḥ śrutaśarmaṇā  mahārathāḥ prabhāsaṃ taṃ rundhanti sma dhanurdharāḥ 
ekaḥ kācarako nāma kuraṇḍakagireḥ patiḥ  dvitīyo diṇḍimālī ca pañcakādrisamāśrayaḥ 
vibhāvasus tṛtīyaś ca rājā jayapurācale  caturtho dhavalo nāma bhūmituṇḍakaśāsitā 
te mahārathayūtādhipatayaḥ khecarottamāḥ  prabhāse pañca pañceṣuśatāni mumucuḥ samam 
prabhāsaś ca kramāt teṣām ekaikasyāvahelayā  ekena dhvajam ekena dhanur ekena sārathim 
caturbhir aśvān iṣuṇā tv ekenāpātayac chiraḥ  śarair aṣṭabhir ekaikaṃ samāpyaivaṃ nanāda saḥ 
atha vidyādharā bhūyaḥ śrutaśarmājñayā yudhi  anye catvāra evāsya prabhāsasya samāgaman 
ekaḥ kuvalayaśyāmaḥ kṣetre viśvāvasor budhāt  jāto bhadraṃkaro nāma dvitīyaś ca niyantrakaḥ 
utpanno jambhakakṣetre bhaumād agninibhaprabhaḥ  tṛtīyaḥ kālakopākhyaḥ kṣetre dāmodarasya ca 
jātaḥ śanaiścarāt kṛṣṇakṛṣṇaḥ kapilamūrdhajaḥ  jātaś coḍupateḥ kṣetre mahendrasacivād grahāt 
nāmnā vikramaśaktiś ca caturthaḥ kanakadyutiḥ  trayo 'tirathayūthādhipatīnām eṣu yūthapāḥ 
caturthas tu mahāvīras tadabhyadhikavikramaḥ  te ca prabhāsaṃ divyāstrair yodhayām āsur uddhatāḥ 
mahā em for sahā
tāni nārāyaṇāstreṇa prabhāso 'strāṇy avārayat  teṣāṃ ca helayaikaikasyāṣṭakṛtvo 'cchinad dhanuḥ 
tatas tatprahitān prāsagadādīn pratihatya saḥ  hatāśvasārathīn sarvān virathān akaroc ca tān 
tad dṛṣṭvā visasarjānyāñ chrutaśarmā drutaṃ daśa  rathayūthapayūthādhipatīn vidyādharādhipān 
damākhyaṃ niyamākhyaṃ ca svarūpasadṛśākṛtī  ketumāleśvarakṣetre jātau dvāv aśvinoḥ sutau 
vikramaṃ saṃkramaṃ caiva parākramam athākramam  saṃmardanaṃ mardanaṃ ca pramardanavimardanau 
kṣetrajān makarandasyāpy aṣṭau vasusutān samān  teṣv āgateṣu cādyās te 'py ārohann aparān rathān 
taiś caturdaśabhiḥ kṛtsnair militaiḥ śaravarṣibhiḥ  niṣkampa eva yuyudhe prabhāsaś citram ekakaḥ 
tataḥ sūryaprabhādeśād vyūhāgrāt tyaktasaṃgarau  sa kuñjarakumāraś ca prahastaś ca dhṛtāyudhau 
utpatya vyomamārgeṇa dhavalaśyāmalākṛtī  tasyopajagmatuḥ pārśvaṃ rāmakṛṣṇāv ivāparau 
tau padātī rathasthau dvau damaṃ ca niyamaṃ ca tam  vyākulīcakratuś chinnacāpau nihatasārathī 
bhayād ārūḍhayor vyoma tayor ārohataḥ sma tau  sa kuñjarakumāraś ca prahastaś ca dhṛtāyudhau 
tad dṛṣṭvā rabhasāt sūryaprabho 'tra prāhiṇot tayoḥ  mahābuddhyacaladbuddhī sārathitve svamantriṇau 
so 'tha prahasto dṛṣṭvā tāv adṛśyāv api māyayā  siddhāñjanaprayogeṇa sakuñjarakumārakaḥ 
tathā vivyādha bāṇaughaiḥ palāyya yayatur yathā  damaś ca niyamaś cobhau tau vidyādharaputrakau 
prabhāso yudhyamānaś ca śeṣair dvādaśabhiḥ saha  teṣāṃ cakarta kodaṇḍān asakṛt kalitān api 
prahasto 'bhyetya sarveṣām avadhīt sārathīn samam  sa kuñjarakumāro 'pi jaghānaiṣāṃ turaṃgamān 
tatas tatrārathāḥ sarve dvādaśāpi sametya te  hanyamānās tribhir vīraiḥ palāyya samarād yayuḥ 
tato 'nyau śrutaśarmā dvau rathātirathayūthapau  vidyādharau preṣitavān duḥkhakrodhatrapākulaḥ 
ekaṃ candrakulādrīndrapateḥ kṣetre niśākarāt  utpannaṃ candraguptākhyaṃ kāntaṃ candram ivāparam 
dhuraṃdharācalādhīśakṣetre jātaṃ mahādyutim  nagaraṃgamanāmānaṃ dvitīyaṃ sacivaṃ svakam 
tāv api kṣiptabāṇaughau kṣaṇena virathīkṛtau  taiḥ prabhāsādibhis tyaktvā yuddhaṃ naṣṭau babhūvatuḥ 
tato nadatsu manujeṣv asureṣu ca sa svayam  āgāc caturbhiḥ sahitaḥ śrutaśarmā mahārathaiḥ 
mahaughārohaṇotpātavetravatsaṃjñakaiḥ kramāt  tvaṣṭur bhagasya cāryamṇaḥ pūṣṇaś cāpy ātmasaṃbhavaiḥ 
caturṇāṃ citrapādādividyādharamahībhujām  malayādyadrināthānāṃ kṣetrajaiḥ prājyavikramaiḥ 
tatas tenātyamarṣāndhenātmanā pañcamena te  ayudhyanta prabhāsādyās trayo 'tra śrutaśarmaṇā 
tadā tair muktam anyonyaṃ bāṇajālaṃ babhau divi  raṇalakṣmyā tapaty arke vitānakam ivātatam 
tato vidyādharās te 'pi punas tatrāyayur mṛdhe  virathībhūya ye naṣṭā babhūvuḥ samarāt tadā 
atha tāñ śrutaśarmādīn militān āhave bahūn  dṛṣṭvā sūryaprabho 'nyān svān prabhāsādyanupoṣaṇe 
mahārathān prahitavān prajñāḍhyaprabhṛtīn sakhīn  vīrasenaśatānīkamukhyān rājasutāṃs tadā 
vyomnātra teṣāṃ yātānāṃ sa ca sūryaprabho rathān  bhūtāsanavimānena prajighāya dyuvartmanā 
tataḥ sarveṣu teṣv atra rathārūḍheṣu dhanviṣu  vidyādharendrāḥ śeṣā apy ājagmuḥ śrutaśarmaṇaḥ 
teṣāṃ vidyādhareśānāṃ taiḥ prabhāsādibhiḥ saha  saṃprahāraḥ pravṛtto 'bhūn mahāsainyakṣayāvahaḥ 
tatra ca dvandvasaṅgrāmeṣv anyonyaṃ sainyayor dvayoḥ  hatā mahārathās te te mānuṣāsurakhecarāḥ 
vīrasenena nihataḥ sānugo dhūmralocanaḥ  vīraseno 'pi virathībhūtaḥ san hariśarmaṇā 
hato vidyādharo vīro hiraṇyākṣo 'bhimanyunā  abhimanyuḥ sunetreṇa hato haribhaṭas tathā 
sunetraś ca prabhāsena śiraś chitvā nipātitaḥ  jvālāmālī mahāyuś cāpy anyonyena hatāv ubhau 
kumbhīrako nīrasakaḥ prāharan daśanair api  kharvaś ca bhujayoś chedāt suśarmā cogravikramaḥ 
trayaḥ śatrubhaṭavyāghrabhaṭasiṃhabhaṭā api  hatāḥ pravahaṇenaite vidyādharamahībhṛtā 
sa surohavirohābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ pravahaṇo hataḥ  śmaśānavāsinā dvau ca hatau siṃhabalena tau 
sa pretavāhanaḥ siṃhabalaḥ kapilako 'pi ca  citrāpīḍas tato vidyādharendro 'tha jagajjvaraḥ 
tataḥ kāntāpatiḥ śūraḥ suvarṇaś ca mahābalaḥ  dvau ca kāmaghanakrodhapatī vidyādhareśvarau 
baladevas tato rājā vicitrāpīḍa eva ca  rājaputraśatānīkenaite daśa nipātitāḥ 
evaṃ hateṣu vīreṣu dṛṣṭvā vidyādharakṣayam  śrutaśarmā śatānīkam abhyadhāvat svayaṃ krudhā 
tatas tayor ā dināntaṃ sainyakṣayakaraṃ mahat  āścaryam api devānāṃ tāvad yuddham abhūd dvayoḥ 
śatāni yāvad utthāya kabandhānāṃ samantataḥ  bhūtānāṃ cakrur ālambaṃ saṃdhyānṛttotsavāgame 
ahnaḥ kṣaye 'tha bahusainyavināśavignā vidyādharā nihatabāndhavaduḥkhitāś ca  martyāsurāḥ prasabhalabdhajayāś ca jagmuḥ saṃhṛtya yuddham ubhaye svaniveśanāni 
tatkālam atra ca sumeruniveditau dvau vidyādharāv adhipatī rathayūthapānām  abhyetya taṃ parihṛtaśrutaśarmapakṣau sūryaprabhaṃ jagadatur vihitapraṇāmau 
āvāṃ mahāyānasumāyasaṃjñāv ubhāv ayaṃ siṃhabalas tṛtīyaḥ  mahāśmaśānādhipatitvasiddhā vidyādharendrair aparair adhṛṣyāḥ 
teṣāṃ śmaśānāntasukhasthitānām asmākam āgan nikaṭaṃ kadācit  sadā prasannā śarabhānanākhyā sadyoginī divyamahāprabhāvā 
kutra sthitā tvaṃ vada kiṃ ca tatra dṛṣṭaṃ bhavatyā bhagavaty apūrvam  sāsmābhir itthaṃ praṇipatya pṛṣṭā vṛttāntam evaṃ vadati sma deva 
draṣṭuṃ prabhuṃ svaṃ saha yoginībhir devaṃ mahākālam ahaṃ gatāsam  vyajijñapat tatra ca matsamakṣam āgatya vetālapatis tam ekaḥ 
asmanmahāsainyapates tanūjāṃ vidyādhareśair nihatasya deva  paśyāgnikākhyasya haraty akāṇḍe tejaḥprabho nāma mahārgharūpām 
siddhaiś ca vidyādharacakravartipatnībhavitrī gaditā prabho sā  tan mocayaināṃ kuru naḥ prasādaṃ yāvan na dūraṃ hriyate haṭhena 
ity ārtavetālavaco niśamya prayāta tāṃ mocayateti so 'smān  devaḥ samādikṣad athāmbareṇa gatvaiva sāsmābhir avāpi kanyā 
saccakravartiśrutaśarmahetor etāṃ harāmīti ca taṃ vadantam  saṃstabhya tejaḥprabham ātmaśaktyā sāsmābhir ānīya vibhor vitīrṇā 
prabham em for prabhav
tenārpitā ca svajanāya kanyā dṛṣṭaṃ mayā kāmam apūrvam etat  tato 'tra kāṃścid divasān uṣitvā praṇamya devaṃ tam ihāgatāsmi 
ity uktavākyā śarabhānanā sā yoginy athāsmābhir apṛcchyataivam  ko brūhi vidyādharacakravartī bhaviṣyati tvaṃ khalu vetsi sarvam 
sūryaprabho hanta bhaviṣyatīti prokte tayā siṃhabalo 'bravīn nau  asatyam etan nanu baddhakakṣyā devā hi sendrāḥ śrutaśarmapakṣe 
śrutvaitad āryā vadati sma sā nau na pratyayaś cec chṛṇutaṃ bravīmi  yathā bhaviṣyaty acireṇa yuddhaṃ sūryaprabhasya śrutaśarmaṇaś ca 
haniṣyate siṃhabalo yadāyaṃ yuṣmatsamakṣaṃ yudhi mānuṣeṇa  yuvām abhijñānam idaṃ vilokya vijñāsyathaḥ satyam idaṃ vaco me 
etāvad uktvā kila yoginī sā yayau ca yātāni ca tāny ahāni  pratyakṣam adyeha ca dṛṣṭam etan martyena yat siṃhabalo hato 'sau 
tatpratyayān niścitam eva matvā tvām eva sarvadyucarādhirājam  avām imau pādasarojayugmaṃ samāśritau śāsanavartinau te 
ity uktavantau sa mayādiyuktaḥ sūryaprabhas tāv atha khecarendrau  śraddhāya saṃmānitavān yathārhaṃ hṛṣṭau mahāyānasumāyakau dvau 
tac chrutvā śrutaśarmaṇo 'tra sutarām udvegabhājo vyadhād āśvāsaṃ kila dūtyayā śatamakhaḥ saṃpreṣya viśvāvasum  dhīras tvaṃ bhava sarvadevasahitaḥ prātaḥ kariṣyāmi te sāhāyyaṃ raṇamūrdhanīti dhṛtikṛt saṃdeśya tatsnehataḥ 
sa ca parabalabhedālokanotpannatoṣaḥ samaraśirasi dṛṣṭārātipakṣakṣayaś ca  punar api nijakāntāḥ projjhya sūryaprabhas tā niśi sacivasameto vāsakaṃ svaṃ viveśa 
dṛṣṭā em for dṛbdhā
iti mahākaviśrīsomadevabhaṭṭaviracite kathāsaritsāgare sūryaprabhalambake pañcamas taraṅgaḥ  ṣaṣṭhas taraṅgaḥ  tataḥ sa rātrāv astrīkaḥ śayanastho raṇonmukhaḥ  sūryaprabhaḥ svasacivaṃ vītabhītim abhāṣata 
nidrā me nāsti tat kāṃcit sattvavīrāśritāṃ sakhe  kathām apūrvām ākhyāhi rātrāv asyāṃ vinodinīm 
etat sūryaprabhavaco vītabhītir niśamya saḥ  yathājñāpayasīty uktvā kathāṃ kathitavān imām 
asty alaṃkṛtir etasyāṃ pṛthvyām ujjayinī purī  ratnair aśeṣair nicitā sunirmalaguṇombhitaiḥ 
tasyām abhūn mahāseno nāma rājā guṇipriyaḥ  kalānāṃ caikanilayaḥ sūryendūbhayarūpadhṛk 
tasyāśokavatī nāma rājñī prāṇasamābhavat  yasyā rūpeṇa sadṛśī nāsīd anyā jagattraye 
tayā devyā samaṃ tasya rājyaṃ rājño 'nuśāsataḥ  guṇaśarmābhidhāno 'bhūd vipro mānyas tathā priyaḥ 
sa ca śūro 'tirūpaś ca vedavidyāntago yuvā  kalāśastrāstravid vipraḥ siṣeve taṃ nṛpaṃ sadā 
ekadāntaḥpure nṛttakathāprastāvataḥ sa tam  rājā rājñī ca pārśvasthaṃ guṇaśarmāṇam ūcatuḥ 
sarvajñas tvaṃ na dolātra tad asmākaṃ kutūhalam  nartituṃ ced vijānāsi tat prasīdādya darśaya 
etac chrutvā smitamukho guṇaśarmā jagāda tau  jānāmi kiṃ tu tad yuktam asti nṛttaṃ na saṃsadi 
hāsanaṃ mūḍhanṛttaṃ tat prāyaśaḥ śāstragarhitam  tatrāpi rājñaḥ purato rājñāś ca dhig aho trapā 
ity uktavantaṃ taṃ rājā guṇaśarmāṇam atra saḥ  pratyuvāca tayā rājñā preryamāṇaḥ kutūhalāt 
nedaṃ raṅgādinṛttaṃ tad yat syāt puṃsas trapāvaham  mittragoṣṭhī rahasy eṣā svavaidagdhyapradarśinī 
na cāhaṃ bhavato rājā tvaṃ me mittraṃ hy ayantraṇam  tan nādya bhokṣye bhāvatkam adṛṣṭvā nṛttakautukam 
iti baddhagrahe rājñi sa vipro 'ṅgīcakāra tat  kathaṃ hi laṅghyate bhṛtyair grahikasya prabhor vacaḥ 
tataḥ sa guṇaśarmātra nanartāṅgair yuvā tathā  rājā rājñī ca cittena tau dvau nanṛtatur yathā 
tadante ca dadau rājā vādanāyāsya vallakīm  tasyāṃ ca sāraṇām eṣa dadad evābravīn nṛpam 
devāpraśastā vīṇeyaṃ tad anyā dīyatāṃ mama  asyās tantryāṃ yad etasyāṃ śvavālo vidyate 'ntare 
ahaṃ hy etad vijānāmi tantrījhāṃkāralakṣaṇaiḥ  ity uktvā guṇaśarmāṅkāt tāṃ vipañcīṃ mumoca saḥ 
tataḥ sa siktvā tantrīṃ tāṃ yāvad udveṣṭya bhūpatiḥ  vīkṣate niragāt tāvad vālas tadgarbhataḥ śunaḥ 
tataḥ sarvajñatāṃ tasya praśaṃsan so 'tivismitaḥ  vīṇām ānāyayām āsa mahāsenanṛpo 'parām 
tāṃ sa vāditavān gāyan guṇaśarmā trimārgagām  gaṅgām ivaughasubhagāṃ karṇapāvananiḥsvanām 
tataś citrīyamāṇāya rājñe tasmai sajānaye  darśayām āsa śastrāstravidyā api sa tatkramāt 
athāvocat sa rājā taṃ niyuddhaṃ yadi vetsi tat  ekaṃ me bandhakaraṇaṃ śūnyahastaṃ pradarśaya 
gṛhāṇa deva śastrāṇi mayi prahara ca kramāt  yāvat te darśayāmīti sa vipraḥ pratyuvāca tam 
tataḥ sa rājā khaḍgādi yad yad āyudham agrahīt  tat tat praharatas tasya guṇaśarmāvahelayā 
tenaiva bandhakaraṇenāpahṛtyāpahṛtya saḥ  babandha rājño hastaṃ ca gātraṃ cāpy akṣato muhuḥ 
tatas taṃ rājyasāhāyyasahaṃ matvā dvijottamam  saṃstuvan bahu mene sa rājā sarvātiśāyinam 
sā tv aśokavatī rājñī tasya rūpaṃ guṇāṃś ca tān  dṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭvā dvijasyābhūt sadyas tadgatamānasā 
etaṃ cet prāpnuyāṃ nāhaṃ tat kiṃ me jīvite phalam  iti saṃcintya yuktyā sā rājānam idam abravīt 
āryaputra prasīdājñāṃ dehy asmai guṇaśarmaṇe  yathā māṃ śikṣayaty eṣa vīṇāṃ vādayituṃ prabho 
asyaitad adya dṛṣṭvā hi vīṇāvādananaipuṇam  utpannaḥ ko 'py ayaṃ tatra mama prāṇādhiko rasaḥ 
tac chrutvā guṇaśarmāṇaṃ sa rājā nijagāda tam  vallakīvādanaṃ devīm imāṃ śikṣaya sarvathā 
yathādiśasi kurmo 'tra prārambhaṃ suśubhe 'hani  ity uktvāmantrya sa nṛpaṃ guṇaśarmā gṛhaṃ yayau 
vīṇārambhāvahāraṃ tu cakre sa divasān bahūn  dṛṣṭim anyādṛśīṃ rājñyāḥ prekṣyāpanayaśaṅkitaḥ 
ekasmiṃś ca dine rājño bhuñjānasyāntike sthitaḥ  vyañjanaṃ dadataṃ sūdam ekaṃ mā mety avārayat 
kim etad iti pṛṣṭaś ca rājñā prājño jagāda saḥ  saviṣaṃ vyañjanam idaṃ mayā jñātaṃ ca lakṣaṇaiḥ 
sūdena mama dṛṣṭaṃ hi vyañjanaṃ dadatāmunā  mukhaṃ bhayasakampena śaṅkācakitadṛṣṭinā 
dṛśyate cādhunaivaitat kasmaicid dīyatām idam  bhojanavyañjanaṃ yasya nirhariṣyāmy ahaṃ viṣam 
ity ukte tena rājā sa sūpakāraṃ tam eva tat  vyañjanaṃ bhojayām āsa bhuktvā tac ca mumūrccha saḥ 
mantrāpāstaviṣas tena tataḥ sa guṇaśarmaṇā  rājñā pṛṣṭo yathātattvam eva vakti sma sūpakṛt 
devāhaṃ gauḍapatinā rājñā vikramaśaktinā  viṣaṃ prayoktuṃ prahito yuṣmākam iha vairiṇā 
so 'haṃ vaideśiko bhūtvā kuśalaḥ sūdakarmaṇi  devāyātmānam āvedya praviṣṭo 'tra mahānase 
tac cādya dadad evāhaṃ viṣaṃ vyañjanamadhyagam  lakṣito dhīmatānena prabhur jānāty ataḥ param 
ity uktavantaṃ taṃ sūdaṃ nigṛhya guṇaśarmaṇe  prīto grāmasahasraṃ sa prāṇadāya dadau nṛpaḥ 
anyedyuś cānubadhnantyā rājñyā rājā sa yatnataḥ  vīṇāyā guṇaśarmāṇaṃ śikṣārambham akārayat 
tataḥ śikṣayatas tasya vīṇāṃ sā guṇaśarmaṇaḥ  rājñī vilāsahāsādi cakre 'śokavatī sadā 
ekadā sā kararuhair vidhyantī vijane muhuḥ  uvāca vārayantaṃ taṃ dhīraṃ smaraśarāturā 
vīṇāvādyāpadeśena tvaṃ sundara mayārthitaḥ  tvayi gāḍho 'nurāgo hi jāto me tad bhajasva mām 
evam uktavatīṃ rājñīṃ guṇaśarmā jagāda tām  maivaṃ vādīr mama tvaṃ hi svāmidārā na cedṛśam 
svāmi em for svābhi
asmādṛśaḥ prabhudrohaṃ kuryād virama sāhasāt  ity ūcivāṃsaṃ sā rājñī guṇaśarmāṇam āha tam 
kim idaṃ niṣphalaṃ rūpaṃ vaidagdhyaṃ ca kalāsu te  mām īdṛśīṃ praṇayinīṃ nīrasopekṣase katham 
tac chrutvā guṇaśarmā tāṃ sopahāsam abhāṣata  suṣṭhūktaṃ tasya rūpasya vaidagdhyasya ca kiṃ phalam 
paradārāpahāreṇa yan nākīrtimalīmasam  ihāmutra ca yan na syāt pātāya narakārṇave 
ity ukte tena sā rājñī sakopeva tam abravīt  maraṇaṃ me dhruvaṃ tāvan madvacasy akṛte tvayā 
tad ahaṃ mārayitvā tvāṃ mariṣyāmy avamānitā  guṇaśarmā tato 'vādīt kāmaṃ bhavatu nāma tat 
varaṃ yad dharmapāśena kṣaṇam ekaṃ hi jīvitam  paraṃ na yad adharmeṇa kalpakoṭiśatāny api 
kṣanam em for kṣamam
ślāghyaś cākṛtapāpasya mama mṛtyur agarhitaḥ  na punaḥ kṛtapāpasya garhitaṃ rājaśāsanam 
etac chrutvāpi sā rajñī punar evam uvāca tam  ātmano mama ca drohaṃ mā kṛthāḥ śṛṇu vacmi te 
nātikrāmati rājāyam aśakyam api madvacaḥ  tad asya kṛtvā vijñaptiṃ viṣayān dāpayāmi te 
kārayāmi ca sāmantān sarvāṃs tvadanuyāyinaḥ  tena saṃpatsyase rājā tvam eveha guṇojjvalaḥ 
tatas te kiṃ bhayaṃ kas tvāṃ kathaṃ paribhaviṣyati  tan māṃ bhajasva niḥśaṅkam anyathā na bhaviṣyasi 
iti tāṃ bruvatīṃ matvā sānubandhāṃ nṛpāṅganām  guṇaśarmābravīd yuktyā tatkṣaṇaṃ sa vyapohitum 
yadi te 'tyantanirbandhas tat kariṣye vacas tava  pratibhedabhayād devi sahasā tu na yujyate 
sahasva divasān kāṃścit satyaṃ jānīhi madvacaḥ  sarvanāśaphalenārthas tvadvirodhena ko mama 
ity āśayā tāṃ saṃtoṣya pratipannavacās tayā  guṇaśarmā sa nirgatya yayāv ucchvasitas tataḥ 
tato dineṣu gacchatsu sa mahāsenabhūpatiḥ  gatvaiva veṣṭayām āsa koṭṭasthaṃ somakeśvaram 
tatra prāptaṃ viditvā ca gauḍanāthaḥ sa bhūpatiḥ  etya vikramaśaktis taṃ mahāsenam aveṣṭayat 
tataḥ sa guṇaśarmāṇaṃ mahāsenanṛpo 'bravīt  ekaṃ ruddhvā sthitāḥ santo ruddhāḥ smo 'nyena śatruṇā 
tad idānīm aparyāptāḥ kathaṃ yudhyāmahe dvayoḥ  ayuddhe ruddhake vīra sthāsyāmaś ca kiyac ciram 
tad asmin saṃkaṭe 'smābhiḥ kiṃ kāryam iti tena saḥ  pṛṣṭaḥ pārśvasthito rājñā guṇaśarmābhyabhāṣata 
dhīro bhava kariṣyāmi devopāyaṃ tathāvidham  yenāsmān nistariṣyāmaḥ saṃkaṭād api kāryataḥ 
ity āśvāsya nṛpaṃ dattvā so 'ntardhānāñjanaṃ dṛśoḥ  rātrau vikramaśaktes tad adṛśyaḥ kaṭakaṃ yayau 
praviśya cāntikaṃ tasya suptaṃ ca pratibodhya tam  jagāda viddhi māṃ rājan devadūtam upāgatam 
saṃdhiṃ kṛtvā mahāsenanṛpeṇāpasara drutam  anyathā te sasainyasya nāśaḥ syād iha niścitam 
preṣite ca tvayā dūte sa saṃdhiṃ te 'numaṃsyate  iti vaktuṃ bhagavatā viṣṇunā prahito 'smi te 
bhaktas tvaṃ ca sa bhaktānāṃ yogakṣemam avekṣate  tac chrutvā cintitaṃ tena rajñā vikramaśaktinā 
niścitaṃ satyam evaitad duṣpraveśe 'nyathā katham  iha yaḥ praviśet kaścin naiṣā martyocitā kṛtiḥ 
ity ālocya sa taṃ prāha rājā dhanyo 'smi yasya me  devaḥ samādiśaty evaṃ yathādiṣṭaṃ karomi tat 
iti vādina evāsya rājñaḥ pratyayam ādadhat  añjanāntarhito bhūtvā guṇaśarmā tato yayau 
gatvā yathākṛtaṃ tac ca mahāsenāya so 'bhyadhāt  so 'py abhyanandat kaṇṭhe taṃ gṛhītvā prāṇarājyadam 
prātar vikramaśaktiś ca sa dūtaṃ preṣya bhūpatiḥ  mahāsenena saṃdhāya sasainyaḥ prayayau tataḥ 
mahāseno 'pi jitvā taṃ somakaṃ prāpya hastinaḥ  aśvāṃś cūjjayinīm āgāt prabhāvād guṇaśarmaṇaḥ 
tatrasthaṃ ca nadīsnāne grāhād upavane ca tam  sarpadaṃśaviṣād bhūpaṃ guṇaśarmā rarakṣa saḥ 
gateṣv atha dineṣv āptabalo rājā sa vairiṇam  mahāseno 'bhiyoktuṃ taṃ yayau vikramaśaktikam 
so 'pi buddhvaiva tasyāgre nṛpo yuddhāya niryayau  tataḥ pravavṛte tatra saṅgrāmo 'timahāṃs tayoḥ 
kramāc ca dvandvayuddhena militau tāv ubhāv api  rājānau sahasābhūtām anyonyaṃ virathīkṛtau 
tatas tayor dhāvitayoḥ prakopāt khaḍgahastayoḥ  ākulatvena caskhāla mahāsenanṛpaḥ kṣitau 
skhalite 'smin praharataś cakreṇa bhujam acchinat  rājño vikramaśakteḥ sa guṇaśarmā sakhaḍgakam 
punaś ca hṛdi hatvā taṃ parigheṇa nyapātayat  tac cotthāya mahāseno rājā dṛṣṭvā tutoṣa saḥ 
kiṃ vacmi pañcamaṃ vāram idaṃ prāṇā ime mama  vipravīra tvayā dattā iti taṃ cāvadan muhuḥ 
tato vikramaśaktes tat tasya sainyaṃ sarāṣṭrakam  ācakrāma mahāseno hatasya guṇaśarmaṇā 
ākramya cānyān nṛpatīn sahāye guṇaśarmaṇi  āgatyojjayinīṃ tasthau sa rājā sukhitas tadā 
sā tv aśokavatī rājñī sotsukā guṇaśarmaṇaḥ  virarāma na nirbandhaprārthanāto divāniśam 
sa tu nāṅgīcakāraiva tad akāryaṃ kathaṃcana  dehapātam apīcchanti santo nāvinayaṃ punaḥ 
tato 'śokavatī buddhvā niścayaṃ tasya vairataḥ  ekadā vyājakhedaṃ sā kṛtvā tasthau rudanmukhī 
praviṣṭo 'tha mahāsenas tām ālokya tathāsthitām  papraccha rājā kim idaṃ priye kenāsi kopitā 
brūhi tasya karomy eṣa dhanaiḥ prāṇaiś ca nigraham  iti bruvāṇaṃ taṃ bhūpaṃ rājñī kṛcchrād ivāha sā 
yena me 'pakṛtaṃ tasya naiva tvaṃ nigrahe kṣamaḥ  na sa tādṛk tad etena mithyaivodghāṭitena kim 
ity uktvā sānubandhe sā rājñi mithyaivam abravīt  āryaputrātinirbandho yadi te vacmi tac chṛṇu 
arthaṃ gauḍeśvarāt prāptuṃ tena saṃsthāpya saṃvidam  guṇaśarmā tava drohaṃ kartum aicchac chalād ataḥ 
taṃ ca koṣanibandhādi gauḍaṃ kārayituṃ nṛpam  visasarja sa dūtaṃ svaṃ guptam āptaṃ dvijādhamaḥ 
taṃ dṛṣṭvā tatra sūdas tam āpto rājānam abhyadhāt  ahaṃ te sādhayāmy etat kāryaṃ mārthakṣayaṃ kṛthāḥ 
ity uktvā bandhayitvā taṃ sa dūtaṃ guṇaśarmaṇaḥ  sūdo mantrasrutiṃ rakṣann ihāgād viṣadāyakaḥ 
tanmadhye ca palāyyaiva tato nirgatya bandhanāt  guṇaśarmāntikaṃ dūtas tadīyaḥ so 'py upāgamat 
tenādhigatavṛttāntenoktvā sarvaṃ sa darśitaḥ  sūdo mahānase 'smākaṃ praviṣṭo guṇaśarmaṇe 
tato jñātvā sa dhūrtena sūpakṛd brahmabandhunā  viṣadānodyatas tena tubhyam āvedya ghātitaḥ 
adya tasyeha sūdasya mātṛbhārye tathānujām  vārtām anveṣṭum āyātān guṇaśarmā sa buddhimān 
buddhvā tena hatā tasya bhāryā mātā ca so 'sya tu  bhrātā palāyitau daivāt praviśan mama mandiram 
tena tad varṇyate yāvat sarvaṃ me śaraṇārthinā  guṇaśarmā sa madvāsagṛhaṃ tāvat praviṣṭavān 
taṃ dṛṣṭvā nāma ca śrutvā bhrātā sūdasya tasya saḥ  bhayān nirgatya matpārśvān na jāne kva palāyitaḥ 
guṇaśarmāpi taṃ dṛṣṭvā svabhṛtyaiḥ pūrvadarśitam  abhūt sadyaḥ savailakṣyo vimṛśann iva kiṃcana 
guṇaśarman kim adyaivam anyādṛśa ivekṣyase  ity apṛccham ahaṃ taṃ ca jijñāsur vijane tataḥ 
so 'tha svīkartukāmo mām āha smodbhedaśaṅkitaḥ  devi tvadanurāgāgnidagdho 'haṃ tad bhajasva mām 
anyathāhaṃ na jīveyaṃ dehi me prāṇadakṣiṇām  ity uktvā vāsake śūnye pādayor apatat sa me 
tato 'haṃ pādam ākṣipya saṃbhramād yāvad utthitā  tāvad utthāya tenāham abalāliṅgitā balāt 
tatkṣaṇaṃ ca praviṣṭā me ceṭī pallavikāntikam  tāṃ dṛṣṭvaiva sa niṣkramya guṇaśarmā bhayād gataḥ 
yadi pallavikā nātra prāvekṣyat tat sa niścitam  adhvaṃsayiṣyat pāpo mām ity evaṃ vṛttam adya me 
ity uktvā sā mṛṣā rājñī virarāma ruroda ca  ādāv asatyavacanaṃ paścājjātā hi kustriyaḥ 
rājā ca sa tad ākarṇya jajvāla jhaṭiti krudhā  strīvacaḥpratyayo hanti vicāraṃ mahatām api 
abravīc ca sa kāntāṃ svāṃ samāśvasihi sundari  tasyāvaśyaṃ kariṣyāmi drohiṇo vadhanigraham 
kiṃ tu yuktyā sa hantavyo bhaved apayaśo 'nyathā  khyātaṃ hi yat pañcakṛtvo dattaṃ me tena jīvitam 
tvadāskandanadoṣaś ca loke vaktuṃ na yujyate  ity uktā tena rājñā sā rājñī taṃ pratyabhāṣata 
avācya eṣa doṣaś cet tadā vācyo 'sya so 'pi kim  yo gauḍeśvarasakhyena prabhudreho samudyamaḥ 
evam ukte tayā yuktam uktam ity abhidhāya saḥ  yayau rājā mahāseno nijam āsthānasaṃsadam 
tatra sarve samājagmur darśanāyāsya bhūpateḥ  rājāno rājaputrāś ca sāmantā mantriṇas tathā 
tāvac ca guṇaśarmāpi gṛhād rājakula prati  āgān mārge ca subahūny animittāny avaikṣata 
vāmas tasmābhavat kākaḥ śvā vāmād dakṣiṇaṃ yayau  dakṣiṇo 'haribhūd vāmaḥ saskandhaś cāsphurad bhujaḥ 
aśubhaṃ sūcayanty etāny animittāni me dhruvam  tan mamaivāstu yat kiṃcin mā bhūd rājñas tu matprabhoḥ 
ity antaś cintayan so 'tha nṛpasyāsthānam āviśat  mā syād rājakule kiṃcid viruddham iti bhaktitaḥ 
praṇamyātropaviṣṭaṃ ca na taṃ rājā sa pūrvavat  abhyanandad apaśyat tu tiryak krodheddhayā dṛśā 
kim etad iti tasmiṃś ca guṇaśarmaṇi śaṅkite  sa utthāyāsanād rājā tasya skandha upāviśat 
vismitāṃś cābravīt sabhyān nyāyaṃ me guṇaśarmaṇaḥ  śṛṇuteti tatas taṃ sa guṇaśarmā vyajijñapat 
bhṛtyo 'haṃ tvaṃ prabhus tan nau vyavahāraḥ kathaṃ samaḥ  adhitiṣṭhāsanaṃ paścād yathecchasi tathādiśa 
iti dhīreṇa tenokto mantribhiś ca prabodhitaḥ  adhyāste smāsanaṃ rājā punaḥ sabhyān uvāca ca 
viditaṃ tāvad etad vo mantriṇo yat kramāgatān  vihāya guṇaśarmāyaṃ tāvad ātmasamaḥ kṛtaḥ 
śrūyatāṃ mama caitena kīdṛg dūtagatāgataiḥ  gauḍeśvareṇa kṛtvaikyaṃ drohaḥ kartum acintyata 
ity uktvā varṇayām āsa tat tebhyaḥ sa mahīpatiḥ  yad aśokavatī tasmai jagāda racitaṃ mṛṣā 
yo 'py ātmadhvaṃsanākṣepas tayā tasya mṛṣoditaḥ  niṣkāsya lokān āptebhyaḥ so 'py uktas tena bhūbhujā 
tataḥ sa guṇaśarmā tam uvācāsatyam īdṛśam  deva kenāsi vijñaptaḥ khacitraṃ kena nirmitam 
tac chrutvaiva nṛpo 'vādīt pāpa satyaṃ na ced idam  carubhāṇḍāntarasthaṃ tat kathaṃ jñātaṃ viṣaṃ tvayā 
prajñayā jñāyate sarvam ity ukte guṇaśarmaṇā  aśakyam etad ity ūcus taddveṣeṇānyamantriṇaḥ 
deva tattvam ananviṣya vaktum eva na te kṣamam  prabhuś ca nirvicāraś ca nītijñair na praśasyate 
ity asya vadato bhūyaḥ sa rājā guṇaśarmaṇaḥ  dhāvitvā churikāghātaṃ dadau dhṛṣṭa iti bruvan 
tasmin prahāre karaṇaprayogāt tena vañcite  anye tu praharanti sma vīre tasmin nṛpānugāḥ 
sa cāpi yuddhakaraṇair vañcayitvā kṛpāṇikāḥ  guṇaśarmā samaṃ teṣāṃ sarveṣām apy apāharat 
babandha caitān anyonyakeśapāśena veṣṭitān  kṛtvā karaṇayuktyaiva citraśikṣitalāghavaḥ 
niryayau ca tatas tasyāḥ prasahya nṛpasaṃsadaḥ  jaghāna śatamātraṃ ca yodhānām anudhāvatām 
tato dattvāñcalasthaṃ tad antardhānāñjanaṃ dṛśoḥ  adṛśyaḥ prayayau tasmād deśāt tatkṣaṇam eva saḥ 
dakṣiṇāpatham uddiśya gacchaṃś cācintayat pathi  nūnaṃ tayāśokavatyā mūḍho 'sau prerito nṛpaḥ 
aho viṣād apy adhikāḥ striyo raktavimānitāḥ  aho asevyāḥ sādhūnāṃ rājāno tattvadarśinaḥ 
ityādi cintayan prāpa guṇaśarmā kathaṃcana  grāmaṃ tatra vaṭasyādho dadarśaikaṃ dvijottamam 
śiṣyān adhyāpayantaṃ tam upasṛtyābhyavādayat  so 'pi taṃ vihitātithyaḥ papraccha brāhmaṇaḥ kṣaṇāt 
he brahman katamāṃ śākhām adhīṣe kathyatām iti  tataḥ sa guṇaśarmā taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ pratyavocata 
paṭhāmi dvādaśa brahmañ śākhā dve sāmavedataḥ  ṛgvedād dve yajurvedāt sapta caikām atharvataḥ 
tac chrutvā tarhi devas tvam ity uktvā brāhmaṇo 'tha saḥ  ākṛtyā kathitotkarṣaṃ prahvaḥ papraccha taṃ punaḥ 
ko deśaḥ ko 'nvayo brūhi janmanālaṃkṛtas tvayā  kiṃ te nāma kathaṃ ceyat tvayādhītaṃ kva vā vada 
tac chrutvā guṇaśarmā tam uvācojjayinīpuri  ādityaśarmanāmāsīt ko'pi brāhmaṇaputrakaḥ 
pitā tasya ca bālasya sataḥ pañcatvam āyayau  mātā tena samaṃ patyā viveśa ca hutāśanam 
tataḥ sa vavṛdhe tasyāṃ puri mātulaveśmani  ādityaśarmādhīyāno vedān vidyāḥ kalās tathā 
prāptavidyasya tasyātra japavrataniṣeviṇaḥ  pravrājakena kenāpi sakhyaṃ samudapadyata 
sa parivrāṭ samaṃ tena mittreṇādityaśarmaṇā  gatvā pitṛvane homaṃ yakṣiṇīsiddhaye vyadhāt 
tatra tasyāvirāsīc ca kārtasvaravimānagā  varakanyāparivṛtā divyakanyā svalaṃkṛtā 
sā taṃ madhurayā vācā babhāṣe maskarinn aham  vidyunmālābhidhā yakṣī yakṣiṇyaś cāparā imāḥ 
tad ito matparīvārād gṛhāṇaikāṃ yathāruci  etāvad eva siddhaṃ te mantrasādhanayānayā 
tvayā hi naiva vijñātaṃ pūrṇaṃ manmantrasādhanam  ato 'haṃ te na siddhaiva mānyaṃ kleśaṃ vṛthā kṛthāḥ 
evam uktas tayā yakṣyā parivrāḍ anumānya saḥ  yakṣiṇīm agrahīd ekāṃ tasmāt tatparivārataḥ 
tataś ca vidyunmālā sā tiro 'bhūt tāṃ ca yakṣiṇīm  ādityaśarmā papraccha siddhā pravrājakasya yā 
apy asti vidyunmālāto yakṣiṇī kācid uttamā  tac chrutvā yakṣiṇī sā taṃ pratyuvācāsti sundara 
vidyunmālā candralekhā tṛtīyā ca sulocanā  uttamā yakṣiṇīṣv etā etāsv api sulocanā 
ity uktvā sā yathākālam āgantuṃ yakṣiṇī yayau  ādityaśarmaṇā sākam agāt pravrāṭ ca tadgṛham 
tatra pratidinaṃ tasmai prītā pravrajakāya sā  prāyacchad yakṣiṇī bhogān iṣṭān kālopagāminī 
ekadādityaśarmā ca pravrājakamukhena tām  sulocanāmantravidhiṃ ko jānātīti pṛṣṭavān 
sāpi tanmukha evāsmai yakṣiṇy evaṃ kilābravīt  asti tumbavanaṃ nāma sthānaṃ dakṣiṇadigbhuvi 
tatrāsti viṣṇuguptākhyo veṇātīrakṛtāspadaḥ  pravrājako bhadantāgryaḥ sa tad vetti savistaram 
buddhvaitad yakṣiṇīvākyāt taṃ deśaṃ cotsukau yayau  ādityaśarmānugataḥ prītyā pravrājakena saḥ 
tatrānviṣya yathāvat taṃ bhadantam abhigamya ca  paricaryāparo bhaktyā trīṇi varṣāṇy asevata 
upācarac ca yakṣiṇyā parivrāṭ siddhayā tayā  yathopayogopahṛtair upacārair amānuṣaiḥ 
tatas tuṣṭo bhadanto 'sau tasmāy ādityaśarmaṇe  dadau sulocanāmantram arthitaṃ savidhānakam 
tataś cādityaśarmā taṃ mantraṃ prāpya samāpya ca  homaṃ cakāra saṃpūrṇaṃ gatvaikānte yathāvidhi 
tatas tasya vimānasthā yakṣiṇī sā sulocanā  prādurbabhūva rūpeṇa jagadāścaryadāyinā 
jagāda caitam ehy ehi siddhāhaṃ tava kiṃ punaḥ  ṣaṇmāsaṃ kanyakābhāvo nāpaneyo mama tvayā 
yadi matto mahāvīramṛddhipātraṃ sulakṣaṇam  sarvajñakalpam ajitaṃ putraṃ saṃprāptum icchasi 
ity uktvā sā tathety enam uktavantaṃ ca yakṣiṇī  ādāyādityaśarmāṇaṃ vimānenālakāṃ yayau 
sa ca tatra samīpasthāṃ tāṃ paśyann āsta sarvadā  ādityaśarmā ṣaṇmāsān asidhārāvrataṃ caran 
tatas tuṣṭo dhanādhyakṣo divyena vidhinā svayam  ādityaśarmaṇe tasmai vyatarat tāṃ sulocanām 
tasyāṃ tasya dvijasyātra jāto 'yam aham ātmajaḥ  pitrā ca me kṛtaṃ nāma guṇaśarmeti sadguṇāt 
tatas tatraiva yakṣādhipater maṇidharābhidhāt  kramād vedāś ca vidyāś ca kalāś cādhigatā mayā 
athaikadā kim apy āgāc chakro 'tra dhanadāntikam  udatiṣṭhaṃś ca taṃ dṛṣṭvā ye tatrāsata kecana 
matpitādityaśarmā tu tatkālaṃ vidhiyogataḥ  anyatra gatacittatvān nodatiṣṭhat sasaṃbhramaḥ 
tatas tam aśapat kruddhaḥ sa śakro dhig jaḍa vraja  svam eva martyalokaṃ taṃ neha yogyo bhavān iti 
praṇipatyānunīto 'tha sa sulocanayā tayā  śakro 'bravīt tarhi mā gān martyalokamayaṃ svayam 
etat putras tu yātv eṣa putro hy ātmaiva kathyate  mā bhūn madvacanaṃ mogham ity uktvendraḥ śamaṃ yayau 
tataḥ pitrāham ānīya nijamātulaveśmani  ujjayinyāṃ vinikṣipto bhavitavyaṃ hi yasya tat 
tatrājāyata sakhyaṃ me rājñātratyena daivataḥ  tato 'tra mama yad vṛttaṃ tat sarvaṃ śṛṇu vacmi te 
ity uktvāmūlavṛttāntaṃ yad aśokavatīkṛtam  yac ca rājñā kṛtaṃ tasya yuddhāntaṃ tad avarṇayat 
punaś covāca taṃ brahmann ittham asmi palāyitaḥ  deśāntaraṃ vrajan mārge bhavantam iha dṛṣṭavān 
śrutvaitad brāhmaṇas taṃ sa guṇaśarmāṇam abhyadhāt  tarhi dhanyo 'smi saṃvṛttas tvadabhyāgamanāt prabho 
tad ehi me gṛhaṃ tāvad agnidattaṃ ca viddhi mām  nāmnā madagrahāraś ca grāmo 'yaṃ nirvṛto bhava 
ity uktvā so 'gnidattas taṃ gṛhaṃ prāveśayan nijam  ṛddhimad guṇaśarmāṇaṃ bahugomahiṣīhayam 
tatra snānāṅgarāgābhyāṃ vastrair ābharaṇaiś ca tam  atithiṃ mānayām āsa bhojanair vividhaiś ca saḥ 
adarśayac ca tasmai svāṃ kāmyarūpāṃ surair api  lakṣaṇāvekṣaṇam iṣāt sundarīṃ nāma kanyakām 
guṇaśarmāpi so 'nanyasamarūpāṃ vilokya tām  sapatnyo 'syā bhaviṣyantīty agnidattam uvāca tam 
nāsāyāṃ tilako 'sty asyās tatsaṃbandhāc ca vacmy aham  urasy asti dvitīyo 'pi tayoś caitat phalaṃ viduḥ 
evaṃ tenodite tasyā bhrātā pitur anujñayā  udghāṭayaty uro yāvat tāvat tīlakam aikṣata 
tato 'gnidattaḥ sāścaryo guṇaśarmāṇam abhyadhāt  sarvajñas tvam imau tv asyās tilakau nāśubhapradau 
sapatnyo hi bhavantīha prāyaḥ śrīmati bhartari  daridro bibhṛyād ekām api kaṣṭaṃ kuto bahūḥ 
tac chrutvā guṇaśarmā taṃ pratyuvāca yathāttha bhoḥ  sulakṣaṇāyā īdṛśyā hy akṛter aśubhaṃ kutaḥ 
ity ūcivān prasaṅgena pṛṣṭas tasmai śaśaṃsa saḥ  pratyaṅgaṃ tilakādīnāṃ phalaṃ strīpuṃsayoḥ pṛthak 
tadā ca guṇaśarmāṇaṃ taṃ sā dṛṣṭvaiva sundarī  ity eṣa pātuṃ dṛṣṭyaiva cakorīvendum utsukā 
tato 'gnidatto vijane guṇaśarmāṇam āha tam  mahābhāga dadāmy etāṃ kanyāṃ te sundarīm aham 
mā gā videśaṃ tiṣṭheha gṛhe mama yathāsukham  etat tadvacanaṃ śrutvā guṇaśarmāpy uvāca tam 
satyam evaṃ kṛte kiṃ kiṃ na saukhyaṃ mama kiṃ tu mām  mithyā rājāvamānāgnitaptaṃ prīṇāsti naiva tat 
kāntā candrodayo vīṇāpañcamadhvanir ity amī  ye nandayanti sukhitān duḥkhitān vyathayanti te 
jāyā ca svarasā raktā bhaved avyabhicārinī  avaśā pitṛdattā tu syād aśokavatī yathā 
itaḥ pradeśān nikaṭā sā kiṃ cojjayinī puri  tad buddhvā sa nṛpo jātu mama kuryād upadravam 
tat paribhramya tīrthāni prakṣālyājanmakilbiṣam  śarīram etat tyakṣyāmi bhaviṣyāmy atha nirvṛtaḥ 
ity uktavantaṃ pratyāha so 'gnidatto vihasya tam  tavāpi moho yatredṛk tatrānyasya kim ucyatām 
ajñāvamānād dhāniḥ kā vada śuddhāśayasya te  paṅko hi nabhasi kṣiptaḥ kṣeptuḥ patati mūrdhani 
rājaiva so cirāt prapsyaty aviśeṣajñatāphalam  mohāndham avivekaṃ hi śrīś cirāya na sevate 
kiṃ cāśokavatī dṛṣṭvā vairasyaṃ strīṣu cet tava  satīṃ dṛṣṭvā na kiṃ tāsu śraddhā vetsi ca lakṣaṇam 
nikaṭojjayinī vā cet tava dāsyāmy ahaṃ tathā  yathā tvām iha tiṣṭhantaṃ naiva jñāsyati kaścana 
tīrthayātrā taveṣṭā vā tac chastā tasya sā budhaiḥ  saṃpattir vidhivan na syād vaidike yasya karmaṇi 
anyathā devapitragnikriyāvratajapādibhiḥ  gṛhe yā puṇyaniṣpattiḥ sādhvani bhramataḥ kutaḥ 
bhujopadhāno bhūśāyī bhikṣāśī kevalo 'dhanaḥ  muneḥ samatvaṃ prāpyāpi na kleśair mucyate 'dhvagaḥ 
dehatyāgāt sukhaṃ yad vā vāñchasy eṣa tava bhramaḥ  itaḥ kaṣṭataraṃ duḥkham amutra hy ātmaghātinām 
tad eṣo 'nucito moho yūnaś ca viduṣaś ca te  svayaṃ vicārayāvaśyaṃ kartavyaṃ madvacas tava 
kārayāsmīha guptaṃ te bhūgṛhaṃ pṛthu sundaram  vivāhya sundarīṃ duḥkham amutra hy ātmaghātinām 
iti tenāgnidattena bodhitaḥ sa prayatnataḥ  guṇaśarmā tathety etat pratipadya jagāda tam 
kṛtaṃ mayā te vacanaṃ ko bhāryāṃ sundarīṃ tyajet  kiṃ tv etām akṛtī nāhaṃ pariṇeṣyāmi te sutām 
ārādhayāmy ahaṃ tāvad devaṃ kaṃcit susaṃyataḥ  yena tasya kṛtaghnasya rājñaḥ kuryāṃ pratikriyām 
iti tadvacanaṃ hṛṣṭaḥ so 'gnidatto 'nvamanyata  so 'pi tāṃ guṇaśarmātra viśaśrāma sukhaṃ niśām 
anyedyuś cāgnidatto 'sya saukhyārthaṃ tatra guptimat  pātālavasatiprakhyaṃ kārayām āsa bhūgṛham 
tatrasthaś cāgnidattaṃ sa guṇaśarmābravīd rahaḥ  ihāntar brūhi kaṃ devaṃ kena mantreṇa bhaktitaḥ 
ārādhayāmy ahaṃ tāvad varadaṃ vratacaryayā  ity uktavantaṃ taṃ dhīram agnidatto 'bhyabhāṣata
